tika-vin10t:32_0: Sasikkho sādiyanto so, ṭhapetvā kiriyaṃ cuto.
tika-vin10t:83_0: Nimittaṃ itthiyā tassa, chupato garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:109_0: Apade ahayo macchā, kapotā dvipadepi ca;
tika-vin10t:154_0: Tatthajātakakaṭṭhaṃ vā, lataṃ vā chindato pana;
tika-vin10t:157_0: Pathaviṃ khaṇato vāpi, byūhato paṃsumeva vā;
tika-vin10t:158_0: Āmasantassa vā kumbhiṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:166_0: Uddharantassa khāṇuṃ vā, chindato saṅkhalimpi vā;
tika-vin10t:167_0: Thullaccayaṃ tato kumbhiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:169_0: Paṭhamaṃ pana kumbhiṃ vā, uddharitvā tathā puna;
tika-vin10t:170_0: Ṭhānā cāveti khāṇuṃ vā, saṅkhaliṃ vāpi so nayo.
tika-vin10t:172_0: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, mūle sāreti rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:175_0: Jātaṃ chindati ce rukkhaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ kumbhimatthake;
tika-vin10t:181_0: Haranto kumbhiyā bhaṇḍaṃ, muṭṭhiṃ chindati attano;
tika-vin10t:182_0: Bhājane vā gataṃ katvā, hoti bhikkhu parājito.
tika-vin10t:184_0: Hāraṃ vā pana pāmaṅgaṃ, suttāruḷhaṃ tu kumbhiyā;
tika-vin10t:185_0: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:191_0: Sakalampi ca taṃ kumbhiṃ, pivato na parājayo.
tika-vin10t:193_0: Sace khipati yaṃ kiñci, bhaṇḍakaṃ telakumbhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:194_0: Taṃ pādagghanakaṃ telaṃ, dhuvaṃ pivati tāvade.
tika-vin10t:197_0: Āviñjetvāpi vā kumbhiṃ, telaṃ gāḷeti ce tathā.
tika-vin10t:200_0: Pītaṃ telañca taṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, uddharantova dhaṃsito.
tika-vin10t:202_0: Tattheva bhindato telaṃ, chaḍḍentassa tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:203_0: Jhāpentassa abhogaṃ vā, karontassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:214_0: Dvīsu passesu pakkhanto, heṭṭhā pādanakhā tathā.
tika-vin10t:220_0: Hatthaṃ vāpi pasāreti, purato vāssa tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:222_0: Moropi gagane pakkhe, cāreti na ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t:228_0: Aggahetvā gahetvā vā, hatthena pana attano;
tika-vin10t:229_0: Ṭhānā cāveti ce moraṃ, sayaṃ ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t:232_0: Kalāpaggena vā phuṭṭhaṃ, mukhatuṇḍena bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t:234_0: Atikkāmeyya yo moraṃ, ṭhānā cāveti nāma so;
tika-vin10t:237_0: Gagane pana gacchanto, kare moro nilīyati;
tika-vin10t:240_0: Sace gaṇhāti taṃ moraṃ, itarena karena so;
tika-vin10t:241_0: Cāvitattā pana ṭhānā, bhikkhu ṭhānā cuto siyā.
tika-vin10t:243_0: Itaraṃ pana morassa, upaneti sace karaṃ;
tika-vin10t:244_0: Na doso tattha uḍḍetvā, sayameva nilīyati.
tika-vin10t:246_0: Disvā aṅge nilīnaṃ taṃ, theyyacittena gacchato;
tika-vin10t:247_0: Pāde thullaccayaṃ hoti, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:255_0: Chijjamānaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, patte patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:261_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, hatthe vattheva matthake;
tika-vin10t:262_0: Taṃ taṃ tassa bhave ṭhānaṃ, yattha yattha patiṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:268_0: Saṃharitvā sace vaṃse, ṭhapitaṃ hoti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:269_0: Katvā punorato bhogaṃ, tathā antañca pārato.
tika-vin10t:272_0: Na tu cīvaravaṃso so, hotīti sakalo mato.
tika-vin10t:275_0: Itarenapi vā phuṭṭhaṃ, orimantena vā puna.
tika-vin10t:280_0: Uddhaṃ vā ukkhipantassa, cīvaraṃ pana vaṃsato;
tika-vin10t:283_0: Rajjukena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:290_0: Saṃharitvā tu nikkhitte, cīvare viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t:292_0: Sikkāya pakkhipitvā yaṃ, laggitaṃ hoti bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:293_0: Sikkāto taṃ haranto vā, saha sikkāya vā cuto.
tika-vin10t:296_0: Agge vā pana bunde vā, gahetvā parikaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t:305_0: Bhittiṃ pana ca nissāya, ṭhapitepi ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:307_0: Cālentassa ca tālassa, phalaṃ vatthu hi pūrati;
tika-vin10t:308_0: Yenassa bandhanā mutte, tasmiṃ pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:310_0: Piṇḍiṃ chindati tālassa, sace pārājikaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:318_0: Vatthu taṃ chindato pupphaṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ vade.
tika-vin10t:321_0: Na chijjati tato yāva, tāva naṃ parirakkhati.
tika-vin10t:327_0: Ākārena sace tāni, ṭhānā cāveti nassati.
tika-vin10t:330_0: Cāletvā udakaṃ puppha-ṭṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:335_0: Accuggatassa taṃ ṭhānaṃ, jalato sakalaṃ jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:341_0: Pupphe gahetvā nāmetvā, uppāṭeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:342_0: Na tassa udakaṃ ṭhānaṃ, naṭṭho uppāṭitakkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:344_0: Yo hi sassāmike macche, theyyacittena gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:347_0: Tassevaṃ gaṇhato vatthu, yena macchena pūrati;
tika-vin10t:353_0: Nīrato uppatitvā yo, tīre patati vārijo;
tika-vin10t:357_0: Ninne macchavisaṃ nāma, pakkhipitvā gate pana.
tika-vin10t:359_0: Pacchā macchavisaṃ macchā, khāditvā pilavanti ce;
tika-vin10t:365_0: Gahetvā sāmikā macche, sace yanti nirālayā;
tika-vin10t:366_0: Gaṇhato pana te sese, theyyacittena dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:369_0: Eseva ca nayo sese, kacchapādimhi vārije.
tika-vin10t:381_0: Purato pacchato vāpi, passato vāpi kaḍḍhato.
tika-vin10t:389_0: Bandhitvā pana yā tīre, ṭhapitā niccale jale;
tika-vin10t:390_0: Bandhanañca ṭhitokāso, ṭhānaṃ tassā dvidhā mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:393_0: Pacchā kenacupāyena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:396_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, theyyacittassa bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:409_0: Theyyā titthe ṭhitaṃ nāvaṃ, āruhitvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:415_0: Āgamma balavā vāto, nāvaṃ harati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:416_0: Vāteneva haṭā nāvā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:419_0: Acāventova taṃ ṭhānā, kiṇitvā ce palāyati.
tika-vin10t:422_0: Sayameva ca gacchantiṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:425_0: Yānaṃ nāma ratho vayhaṃ, sakaṭaṃ sandamānikā;
tika-vin10t:432_0: Yānaṃ pājayato tassa, nisīditvā dhure pana.
tika-vin10t:443_0: Purato pacchato vāpi, ṭhānā cāveti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:444_0: Thullaccayaṃ tu tiṇṇampi, ṭhānā cāve parājayo.
tika-vin10t:453_0: Uddhīsu vā gahetvā taṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:455_0: Ṭhapitassa hi cakkassa, nābhiyā pana bhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:458_0: Phusitvā yaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhūmiṃ, nemipassena nābhiyā;
tika-vin10t:468_0: Ito cito ca ghaṃsanto, theyyacittena yo pana;
tika-vin10t:471_0: Khandhaṃ oropite bhāre, tassa pārājikaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:482_0: Parājeti paraṃ dhammaṃ, caranto ce parājito.522
tika-vin10t:485_0: Parajjati sayaṃ dhammaṃ, caranto yopi tassa ca.
tika-vin10t:496_0: Asitena ca lāyitvā, chinditvā vā karena ca.
tika-vin10t:498_0: Yasmiṃ bījepi vā vatthu, sīse pūreti muṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:499_0: Bandhanā mocite tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:501_0: Acchinno pana daṇḍo vā, taco vā appamattako;
tika-vin10t:513_0: Tañca kho sāmikānaṃ tu, dhuranikkhepane sati;
tika-vin10t:516_0: Gahetabbā sace hoti, dvīhi khīlehi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:520_0: Rajjuṃ vāpi pasāreti, yaṭṭhiṃ pāteti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:522_0: Yehi dvīhi payogehi, attano santakaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:523_0: Ādo thullaccayaṃ tesu, dutiye ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:527_0: Gāmaṭṭhepi ca vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:530_0: Tiṇaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, lataṃ vā kaṭṭhameva vā;
tika-vin10t:534_0: Tacchetvā ṭhapito rukkho, gahetabbo na kocipi.
tika-vin10t:539_0: Lakkhaṇe challiyonaddhe, na doso koci gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:543_0: Citte cintento vā aññaṃ, bhaṇḍadeyyaṃ hotevassa.
tika-vin10t:561_0: Āviñjitvā pavesetvā, chiddaṃ katvāpi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:563_0: Vāpiyaṃ vā taḷāke vā, bhājanaṃ attano pana;
tika-vin10t:569_0: Anto ṭhatvā bahi ṭhatvā, chindanto ubhayatthapi;
tika-vin10t:576_0: Chinditvā yāva saṅghassa, na niyyādenti te pana;
tika-vin10t:577_0: Ābhataṃ tāva taṃ sabbaṃ, tesameva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:579_0: Tasmā taṃ theyyacittena, gaṇhantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:582_0: Yadā niyyāditaṃ tehi, tato paṭṭhāya saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:586_0: Sabbasādhāraṇattā ca, aññaṃ viya na hotidaṃ.
tika-vin10t:589_0: Aggiṃ vā deti satthena, ākoṭeti samantato;
tika-vin10t:592_0: Yena vā tena vā rukkho, vinassati ca ḍayhati;
tika-vin10t:596_0: Sīsato kaṇṇato vāpi, gīvato hatthatopi vā;
tika-vin10t:608_0: Nivatthaṃ pana vatthaṃ yo, acchindati parassa ce;
tika-vin10t:609_0: Paropi pana lajjāya, sahasā taṃ na muñcati.
tika-vin10t:611_0: Ākaḍḍhati ca coropi, so paro tāva rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:620_0: Athāpi parikappetvā, pātāpeti va yo pana;
tika-vin10t:623_0: Phandāpeti yathāvatthuṃ, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto;
tika-vin10t:624_0: “Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā”ti vadato, na doso chaḍḍitepi ca.
tika-vin10t:626_0: Āgantvā theyyacittena, pacchā taṃ gaṇhato siyā;
tika-vin10t:632_0: “Tiṭṭha tiṭṭhā”ti vutto ca, chaḍḍetvā pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:645_0: “Raho mayā panetassa, ṭhapitaṃ kiṃ nu dassati”;
tika-vin10t:648_0: Tasmiṃ dāne nirussāhe, paro ce nikkhipe dhuraṃ;
tika-vin10t:655_0: Suṅkaghātassa antova, ṭhatvā pāteti ce bahi;
tika-vin10t:656_0: Dhuvaṃ patati ce hatthā, muttamatte parājayo.
tika-vin10t:658_0: Taṃ rukkhe khāṇuke vāpi, hutvā paṭihataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:659_0: Vātukkhittampi vā anto, sace patati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:661_0: Patitvā bhūmiyaṃ pacchā, vaṭṭantaṃ pana bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:664_0: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā pavaṭṭantaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ ce parājayo;
tika-vin10t:668_0: Sārato taṃ gahetabbaṃ, yuttaṃ viya ca dissati.
tika-vin10t:670_0: Sayaṃ vā yadi vaṭṭeti, vaṭṭāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t:671_0: Aṭṭhatvā vaṭṭamānaṃ taṃ, gataṃ nāsakaraṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:673_0: Ṭhatvā ṭhatvā sace anto, bahi gacchati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:676_0: Gacchante pana yāne vā, gaje vā taṃ ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:679_0: Ṭhapite ṭhitayāne vā, payogena vinā gate;
tika-vin10t:682_0: Sace pājeti taṃ yānaṃ, ṭhapetvā yānake maṇiṃ;
tika-vin10t:685_0: Suṅkaṭṭhāne mataṃ suṅkaṃ, gantuṃ datvāva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:689_0: Antojātaṃ dhanakkītaṃ, dinnaṃ vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:692_0: Bhujissaṃ vā harantassa, mānusaṃ mātarāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:707_0: Saṇikaṃ pana gacchantaṃ, sace vadati sopi ca;
tika-vin10t:708_0: Sīghaṃ gacchati ce tassa, vacanena parājayo.
tika-vin10t:710_0: Palāyitvā sace aññaṃ, gāmaṃ vā nigamampi vā;
tika-vin10t:711_0: Gataṃ disvā tato tañce, palāpeti parājayo.
tika-vin10t:724_0: So nikkhamati ce sappo, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:726_0: Tathā katvā tu maṇḍūka-mūsikānaṃ ravampi vā;
tika-vin10t:730_0: Yena kenaci nikkhante, sappe pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:740_0: Ṭhānaṃ sālā ca vatthu ca, aṅgaṇaṃ sakalaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:743_0: Tasmā tesaṃ vasā hatthiṃ, harato kāraye budho.
tika-vin10t:745_0: Nagarassa bahiddhā tu, ṭhitassa pana hatthino;
tika-vin10t:748_0: Nipannassa gajassekaṃ, ṭhānaṃ taṃ uṭṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:749_0: Tasmiṃ uṭṭhitamatte tu, tassa pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:756_0: Garukaṃ theyyacittena, ṭhānā cāveti ce cuto.
tika-vin10t:772_0: Nikkhipeyyassa satthaṃ vā, vadeyya maraṇe guṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:775_0: Asandheyyova so ñeyyo, dvedhā bhinnasilā viya.
tika-vin10t:780_0: Tattha kāyena vā kāya-paṭibaddhena vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:781_0: Mārentassa paraṃ ghāto, ayaṃ sāhatthiko mato.
tika-vin10t:783_0: “Evaṃ tvaṃ paharitvā taṃ, mārehī”ti ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:793_0: Ayaṃ vijjāmayo nāma, payogo pañcamo mato.
tika-vin10t:795_0: Samatthā māraṇe yā ca, iddhi kammavipākajā;
tika-vin10t:801_0: Bahusvapi yamuddissa, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:802_0: Maraṇena ca tasseva, kammunā tena bajjhati.
tika-vin10t:807_0: Mate pahaṭamatte vā, pacchā mubhayathāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:810_0: Evaṃ sāhatthiko ñeyyo, tathā āṇattikopi ca;
tika-vin10t:811_0: Ettāvatā samāsena, dve payogā hi dassitā.
tika-vin10t:813_0: Vatthu kālo ca deso ca, satthañca iriyāpatho;
tika-vin10t:816_0: Māretabbo hi yo tattha, so “vatthū”ti pavuccati;
tika-vin10t:817_0: Pubbaṇhādi siyā kālo, sattānaṃ yobbanādi ca.
tika-vin10t:819_0: Deso gāmādi viññeyyo, satthaṃ taṃ sattamāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:825_0: “Yaṃ mārehī”ti āṇatto, aññaṃ māreti ce tato;
tika-vin10t:834_0: Āṇatto “ajja pubbaṇhe, mārehī”ti ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:835_0: So ce māreti sāyanhe, mūlaṭṭho parimuccati.
tika-vin10t:843_0: Yadā kadāci pubbaṇhe, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t:848_0: “Imaṃ gāme ṭhitaṃ veriṃ, mārehī”ti ca bhāsito;
tika-vin10t:849_0: Sace so pana māreti, ṭhitaṃ taṃ yattha katthaci.
tika-vin10t:851_0: Natthi tassa visaṅketo, ubho bajjhanti kammunā;
tika-vin10t:854_0: “Vaneyevā”ti vā vutto, gāme māreti cepi vā;
tika-vin10t:861_0: Yena kenaci satthena, visaṅketo na mārite.
tika-vin10t:866_0: Iti vutto sace veriṃ, dhārāya itarāya vā;
tika-vin10t:873_0: Māreti naṃ nisinnaṃ ce, visaṅketo na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:876_0: Vutto māreti gacchantaṃ, nisinnaṃ vā yathākkamaṃ.
tika-vin10t:879_0: Eseva ca nayo ñeyyo, sabbiriyāpathesu ca.
tika-vin10t:881_0: “Mārehī”ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t:884_0: “Mārehī”ti ca vijjhitvā, āṇatto hi parena so;
tika-vin10t:885_0: Chinditvā yadi māreti, visaṅketova hoti so.
tika-vin10t:890_0: Dīghaṃ rassaṃ kisaṃ thūlaṃ, kāḷaṃ odātameva vā;
tika-vin10t:893_0: Sopi yaṃ kiñci āṇatto, sace māreti tādisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:897_0: Khaṇantassa ca opātaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:900_0: Patitvā ca mate tasmiṃ, tassa pārājikaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:902_0: Nipatitvā panaññasmiṃ, mate doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:905_0: “Patitvā ettha yo koci, maratū”ti hi yattakā;
tika-vin10t:906_0: Maranti nipatitvā ce, dosā hontissa tattakā.
tika-vin10t:911_0: Patitvā gabbhinī tasmiṃ, sagabbhā ce marissati;
tika-vin10t:917_0: Verino tattha pātetvā, sace mārenti verino;
tika-vin10t:918_0: Patitaṃ tattha mārenti, nīharitvā sace bahi.
tika-vin10t:920_0: Nibbattitvā hi opāte, matā ce opapātikā;
tika-vin10t:921_0: Asakkontā ca nikkhantuṃ, sabbattha ca parājayo.
tika-vin10t:929_0: Tathā yakkhādayo pāṇe, khate uddissa bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:933_0: Pāsaṃ oḍḍeti yo tattha, sace bajjhanti pāṇino.
tika-vin10t:938_0: Uddissa hi kate pāse, yaṃ panuddissa oḍḍito;
tika-vin10t:941_0: Mūlena vā mudhā vāpi, dinne pāse parassa hi;
tika-vin10t:944_0: Yena laddho sace lopi, pāsamuggaḷitampi vā;
tika-vin10t:947_0: Yo pāsaṃ uggaḷāpetvā, yāti pāpabhayā sace;
tika-vin10t:948_0: Taṃ disvā puna aññopi, saṇṭhapeti hi tattha ca.
tika-vin10t:950_0: Baddhā baddhā maranti ce, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t:953_0: Gopetvāpi na mokkho hi, pāsayaṭṭhiṃ sayaṃkataṃ;
tika-vin10t:954_0: Tamañño puna gaṇhitvā, saṇṭhapeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:956_0: Tappaccayā marantesu, mūlaṭṭho na ca muccati;
tika-vin10t:957_0: Nāsetvā sabbaso vā taṃ, jhāpetvā vā vimuccati.
tika-vin10t:959_0: Ropentassa ca sūlaṃ vā, sajjentassa adūhalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:984_0: Jānāti ce hoti cuto hi no ce;
tika-vin10t:1002_0: Paṭhame dutiye cante, pariyāyo na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:1006_0: Sesā ca tisamuṭṭhānā, tesamaṅgāni satta tu.
tika-vin10t:1020_0: Mudupiṭṭhi ca lambī ca, mukhaggāhī nisīdako;
tika-vin10t:1051_0: Sukkaṃ yadi vimoceti, garukaṃ tassa niddise.
tika-vin10t:1054_0: Thullaccayaṃ samuddiṭṭhaṃ, sace sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t:1057_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, yadi sukkaṃ na muccati.
tika-vin10t:1059_0: Vatthiṃ kīḷāya pūretvā, passāvetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1081_0: Ekena pana hatthena, gahetvā dutiyena vā;
tika-vin10t:1087_0: Aṅgulīnaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, gahaṇe ekato pana;
tika-vin10t:1088_0: Ekāyeva siyāpatti, na hi koṭṭhāsato siyā.
tika-vin10t:1118_0: Vādāpetuñca vādetuṃ, vāditaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1121_0: Pūjā buddhassa kātabbā, vattabbāti ca viññunā.
tika-vin10t:1143_0: Gaṇanāya ca vācānaṃ, itthīnaṃ garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:1145_0: Sā ce nappaṭijānāti, tassa thullaccayaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:1165_0: Tasmiṃyeva khaṇe sā ce, jānāti garukaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1167_0: No ce jānāti sā yakkhi-petidevīsu paṇḍake;
tika-vin10t:1168_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassa, sese āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1174_0: Obhāso tena rāgena, khaṇe tasmiṃ vijānanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1181_0: Vīmaṃsati garu hoti, paccāharati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:1196_0: Ekeneva ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1198_0: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, gilānassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:1224_0: Sace ekavipannā sā, garukaṃ ekakaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1230_0: Hatthakammampi nāmetaṃ, kiñci vatthu na hoti hi.
tika-vin10t:1235_0: “Goṇaṃ demā”ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1244_0: Paccayesu hi tīsveva, viññatti na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1250_0: Pharasuṃ vāpi vāsiṃ vā, nisentassāpi dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1251_0: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ rukkhaṃ, tassa pācittiyā saha.
tika-vin10t:1256_0: Yā pana dvīhi piṇḍehi, niṭṭhānaṃ tu gamissati;
tika-vin10t:1257_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tesu, paṭhame dutiye garu.
tika-vin10t:1260_0: Tathā bhūmiṃ samaṃ katvā, bhindatopi ca taṃ kuṭiṃ.
tika-vin10t:1265_0: Desāpetvāva bhikkhūhi, vatthuṃ pana ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:1272_0: Adesetvā sace vatthuṃ, yo kareyya mahallakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1286_0: Suddhaṃ vā yadi vāsuddhaṃ, tesu aññatarena yo.
tika-vin10t:1300_0: Taṃ ce paro vijānāti, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:1305_0: Atha sopi “mayā diṭṭhaṃ, sutaṃ vā”ti ca bhāsati;
tika-vin10t:1306_0: Tesaṃ dvinnampi saṅghādi-seso hoti na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:1308_0: Dūtaṃ vā pana pesetvā, paṇṇaṃ vā pana sāsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1318_0: Tathā kammaṃ karontassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1333_0: Codeti vā tathāsaññī, codāpeti parena vā;
tika-vin10t:1337_0: Samaggassa ca saṅghassa, bhedatthaṃ vāyameyya yo;
tika-vin10t:1340_0: So hi bhikkhūhi vattabbo, “bhedatthaṃ mā parakkama”;
tika-vin10t:1343_0: Vuccamāno hi teheva, nissajjeyya na ceva yaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1347_0: Disvā sutvā hi ñatvā vā, avadantassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1350_0: Dūrampi pana gantabbaṃ, sace sakkoti tāvade.
tika-vin10t:1353_0: Dūtaṃ vā pana paṇṇaṃ vā, pesatopi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1356_0: Kammavācāhi ca dvīhi, hoti thullaccayaṃ dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1364_0: Ñattito pana pubbe vā, pacchā vā taṅkhaṇepi vā;
tika-vin10t:1371_0: Yasmiñca nibbematiko, taṃ sabbaṃ tassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1401_0: Kamme kariyamāne taṃ, accajaṃ garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:1403_0: Cuṇṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ phalaṃ pupphaṃ, veḷuṃ kaṭṭhañca mattikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1415_0: Haritvā vā harāpetvā, pitūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1418_0: Tañca kho vatthupūjatthaṃ, dātabbaṃ na panaññathā;
tika-vin10t:1430_0: Gilānānaṃ manussānaṃ, dātabbaṃ tu sakaṃ phalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1433_0: Saṅghārāme yathā yatra, saṅghena katikā katā;
tika-vin10t:1446_0: Tathā ropāpane vuttaṃ, ubhayattha ca bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:1448_0: Sakiṃ āṇattiyā tassa, bahūnaṃ ropane pana;
tika-vin10t:1449_0: Sadukkaṭā tu pācitti, suddhaṃ vā dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:1452_0: Ropane paribhogatthaṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:1454_0: Kappiyabhūmi ce hoti, sayaṃ ropetumeva ca;
tika-vin10t:1458_0: Vaṭṭateva ca bhikkhūnaṃ, taṃ phalaṃ paribhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:1460_0: Siñcane pana sabbattha, sayaṃ siñcāpanepi ca;
tika-vin10t:1467_0: Siñcane dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, tathā siñcāpanepi ca.
tika-vin10t:1475_0: Ganthimaṃ gopphimaṃ nāma, vedhimaṃ veṭhimampi ca;
tika-vin10t:1478_0: Tattha daṇḍena daṇḍaṃ vā, vaṇṭenapi ca vaṇṭakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1487_0: Veṭhimaṃ nāma veṭhetvā, kataṃ mālāguṇehi vā;
tika-vin10t:1496_0: Sabbametaṃ sayaṃ kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:1500_0: Aññehi pūritaṃ puppha-paṭaṃ vā vāyitumpi ca.
tika-vin10t:1503_0: Kharapattamayaṃ mālaṃ, sabbaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1509_0: Pupphesuyeva vā pupphaṃ, pavesetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1512_0: Pavesentassa pupphāni, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:1521_0: Atha kho vejjakammādi, na kattabbaṃ kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1529_0: Jeṭṭhabhātā kaniṭṭho ca, tathā bhaginiyo duve;
tika-vin10t:1532_0: Pitucchā mātulo cāti, dasime ñātayo matā;
tika-vin10t:1535_0: Sace bhesajjametesaṃ, nappahoti na hoti vā;
tika-vin10t:1536_0: Yācantipi ca taṃ bhikkhuṃ, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1538_0: Sace te na ca yācanti, dātabbaṃ tāvakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1539_0: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā vā, “dassanti puna me ime”.
tika-vin10t:1541_0: Etesaṃ tu kulā yāva, sattamā kuladūsanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1545_0: Sace te ñātakā honti, kātuṃ tesampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1547_0: Aññātakā sace honti, bhātuno anujāya vā;
tika-vin10t:1550_0: Atha tesampi puttānaṃ, katvā dātabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t:1562_0: Jalaṃ hatthena cāletvā, madditvā pana suttakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1564_0: Dātabbaṃ bhikkhunā katvā, tesameva ca santakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1565_0: Attano udakaṃ tesaṃ, suttaṃ vā deti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1574_0: Ṭhapetvā taṃ panaññassa, pitunopi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1577_0: Satthunā dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, karontassa pade pade.
tika-vin10t:1583_0: Pañcannaṃ sahadhammīnaṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:1618_0: Kammavācā hi kātabbā, dātabbo tassa tena ca.
tika-vin10t:1624_0: Chedaṃ vā vattabhedaṃ vā, akatvāva sadā vase.
tika-vin10t:1626_0: Parivāso visodhetuṃ, na sakkā tattha ce pana;
tika-vin10t:1627_0: Nikkhipitvāna taṃ vattaṃ, vatthabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:1629_0: Tattheva saṅghamajjhe vā, puggale vāpi nikkhipe;
tika-vin10t:1630_0: Nikkhipāmīti vattaṃ vā, parivāsanti vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:1642_0: Gumbena vatiyā vāpi, channaṭṭhāne ṭhitena tu.
tika-vin10t:1647_0: Nikkhipitvā tato vattaṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1648_0: Antoyevāruṇe bhikkhu, gato ce yassa kassaci.
tika-vin10t:1650_0: Ārocetvāva taṃ vattaṃ, nikkhipe puna paṇḍito;
tika-vin10t:1660_0: Ekaccaṃ sakalaṃ vāpi, dātabbo vimatissa vā.
tika-vin10t:1674_0: Tathā sambahulāsvekā, dve vā sambahulāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:1675_0: Yā yā cirapaṭicchannā, tāsaṃ agghavasena hi.
tika-vin10t:1681_0: Sabbātā ekato katvā, dātabbo missako mato.
tika-vin10t:1686_0: Tattha yā apaṭicchannā, hoti āpatti yassa tu;
tika-vin10t:1698_0: Nikkhipe santike tesaṃ, vattaṃ tesu gatesu vā;
tika-vin10t:1710_0: Chādetvā vāpi āpattiṃ, acchādetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:1723_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1730_0: Na karoti anāpattiṃ, itthīnaṃ tu satampi ca.
tika-vin10t:1742_0: Anandhābadhiro viññū, itthī vā purisopi vā;
tika-vin10t:1745_0: Andho abadhiro vāpi, badhiro vāpi cakkhumā;
tika-vin10t:1752_0: Cīvaraṃ chabbidhaṃ vuttaṃ, jātito pana kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1760_0: Ekāhampi vinā bhikkhu, na vaseyya ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:1763_0: Rajitvā kappiyaṃ binduṃ, datvā tattha ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:1767_0: Muṭṭhittikā ca tiriyaṃ, uttamantena sā pana.
tika-vin10t:1783_0: Tīṇipi dvepi cekaṃ vā, chinditabbaṃ pahoti ce;
tika-vin10t:1787_0: Bhikkhuno dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, dubbhogena ca sevato.
tika-vin10t:1804_0: Eko tantupi acchinno, adhiṭṭhānaṃ na bhindati;
tika-vin10t:1807_0: Paṭhamaṃ aggaḷaṃ datvā, pacchā chindati rakkhati;
tika-vin10t:1808_0: Ghaṭetvā koṭiyo dve vā, pacchā chindati rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:1837_0: Gaṇanaṃ vā pamāṇaṃ vā, na parikkhāracoḷake;
tika-vin10t:1850_0: Puna paccuddharitvā taṃ, vikappeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:1852_0: Tāva kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ, yāva rogo na sammati;
tika-vin10t:1883_0: Vuttattā ca nisedhetuṃ, na sakkā vinayaññunā.
tika-vin10t:1892_0: Dukkaṭaṃ tiriṭe vāpi, veṭhane kañcukepi ca.
tika-vin10t:1910_0: Bhikkhuno pana tenassa, vippavatthuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:1914_0: Aruṇe uṭṭhite kiṃ nu, kātabbaṃ tena bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:1917_0: Tabbhayā pana so bhikkhu, naggo gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1920_0: Na tassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ atthi kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:1922_0: Nigāsetvā gahetvā ca, gantvā bhikkhussa santikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:1926_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pārupanādisu.
tika-vin10t:1931_0: There ca dahare maggaṃ, gacchantesu ubhosupi;
tika-vin10t:1935_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, na passambhati nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1938_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1941_0: Hoti nissaggiyaṃ vatthaṃ, passambhati ca nissayo.
tika-vin10t:1951_0: Paccāsāya tato uddhaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1959_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā bhuttaṃ, vatthaṃ aññātikāya yo;
tika-vin10t:1963_0: Tathā sesehi ca dvīhi, dīpitaṃ dukkaṭadvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1965_0: Sikkhamānāya vā hatthe, dhovanatthāya deti ce;
tika-vin10t:1966_0: Sā hutvā upasampannā, pacchā dhovati so nayo.
tika-vin10t:1975_0: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, sace dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:1977_0: “Dhovā”ti bhikkhunī vuttā, sace sabbaṃ karoti sā;
tika-vin10t:1987_0: Tāya dhovāpane vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:1989_0: Avuttā paribhuttaṃ vā, aññaṃ vā yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t:2008_0: Aññaṃ pana parikkhāraṃ, na doso hoti gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:2019_0: Aññassatthāya vā tassa, ñātake vā pavārite.
tika-vin10t:2028_0: Yassa tīṇipi naṭṭhāni, dve vā ekampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2029_0: Dve vā ekampi vā tena, sāditabbaṃ na kiñcipi.
tika-vin10t:2039_0: Cīvare pana yo tassa, lābhā nissaggiyaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:2053_0: Akappiyaṃ suvaṇṇādiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2055_0: Rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ vā, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t:2056_0: Atthāya gaṇhituṃ kiñci, dīyamānaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2061_0: Netvā akappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, itthaṃ koci sace vade;
tika-vin10t:2064_0: Ārāmaṃ vā vihāraṃ vā, cetiyaṃ vā karohi”ti;
tika-vin10t:2065_0: Na ca vaṭṭati taṃ vatthuṃ, sabbesaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2067_0: Anāmasitvā saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ vā puggalampi vā;
tika-vin10t:2070_0: Taṃ hiraññaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ vā, nisedhetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2077_0: Gahaṇaṃ paribhogo vā, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:2080_0: Iccevaṃ pana vatvā ce, deti sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2082_0: Kārāpeti ca kedāre, chindāpetvā vanaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:2086_0: Bhāgaṃ dethā”ti vatvā ce, uṭṭhāpeti kahāpaṇe.
tika-vin10t:2095_0: Rajjuyā vāpi daṇḍena, khettaṃ mināti yo pana.
tika-vin10t:2097_0: Khale vā rakkhati ṭhatvā, khalatopi tato puna;
tika-vin10t:2104_0: Āharanti ca yaṃ vuttā, sabbesaṃ tamakappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2109_0: “Gāvo demā”ti vuttepi, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2113_0: Kappiyena ca vākyena, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2115_0: Hatthiṃ vā mahisaṃ assaṃ, goṇaṃ kukkuṭasūkaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2116_0: Dentesu ca manussesu, na ca vaṭṭati gaṇhituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2118_0: Paṭisiddhepi saṅghassa, datvā gacchati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:2119_0: Mūlaṃ datvā ca saṅghassa, keci gaṇhanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2125_0: Yadi codetiyeva cha, codanā diguṇā ṭhiti.
tika-vin10t:2136_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevamānassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2146_0: Anāpatti tulaṃ vāpi, bahuṃ vā sabbameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2153_0: Imesaṃ pana tiṇṇampi, tatiyaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2156_0: Channaṃ orena vassānaṃ, karontassa ca santhataṃ;
tika-vin10t:2160_0: Kataṃ vā pana aññena, labhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:2176_0: Gacchante pana yāne vā, hatthiassādikesu vā;
tika-vin10t:2182_0: Yāne pana agacchante, asse vā hatthipiṭṭhiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2191_0: Suttakena ca bandhitvā, ṭhapitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2195_0: Yo caññavihito vāpi, āpatti yadi gacchati.
tika-vin10t:2200_0: Nivāsatthāya vā gantvā, harantassa tato paraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2201_0: Acchinnaṃ vāpi nissaṭṭhaṃ, labhitvā haratopi ca.
tika-vin10t:2220_0: Muttā maṇi silā saṅkho, pavāḷaṃ lohitaṅkako;
tika-vin10t:2227_0: Suttaṃ vatthaṃ halaṃ phālaṃ, kappiyaṃ evamādikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2230_0: Sampaṭicchati yo bhikkhu, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2233_0: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthumpi, sabbatthāya ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2241_0: “Idaṃ ayyassa hotū”ti, vutte vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:2244_0: Paṭikkhittepi taṃ vatthuṃ, ṭhapetvā yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t:2245_0: Tathā gopāyitabbaṃ taṃ, yathā taṃ na vinassati.
tika-vin10t:2248_0: Iccevaṃ bhikkhuno vattuṃ, na vaṭṭati akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2254_0: Gahetuṃ aññato laddhaṃ, bhuñjituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2256_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana sambhūtaṃ, paccayaṃ vatthuto tato;
tika-vin10t:2269_0: Vatthuṃ nissaggiyassāpi, vatthuṃ vā dukkaṭassa ca;
tika-vin10t:2270_0: Kappiyassa ca vatthuṃ vā, yo nissaggiyavatthunā.
tika-vin10t:2275_0: Dukkaṭassa ca vatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vā kappiyassa ca;
tika-vin10t:2279_0: Parivatteti yo tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2285_0: Tena dve dukkaṭā honti, cetāpentassa rūpiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2300_0: Tasmā mātāpitūnampi, vatthuṃ yaṃ kiñci kappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2303_0: Sakaṃ vā deti ce bhaṇḍaṃ, evaṃ vatvāna mātuyā;
tika-vin10t:2304_0: Mātuyā vā tathā bhaṇḍaṃ, sayaṃ gaṇhāti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2309_0: “Gahetvā vā idaṃ nāma, bhuñjitvā odanaṃ imaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2310_0: Idaṃ nāma karohī”ti, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2313_0: Challiṃ vā pana valliṃ vā, kaṭṭhaṃ vā dārumeva vā.
tika-vin10t:2326_0: Nissaggiye ca vatthumhi, naṭṭhe bhuttepi vā yathā;
tika-vin10t:2332_0: “Idaṃ mamatthi attho me, iminā”ti ca bhāsato;
tika-vin10t:2338_0: Tayo pattassa vaṇṇā tu, ukkaṭṭho majjhimomako.
tika-vin10t:2343_0: Ukkaṭṭho nāma so patto, yo taṃ sabbaṃ tu gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:2344_0: Majjhimo tassupaḍḍho ca, tadupaḍḍho ca omako.
tika-vin10t:2347_0: Evaṃ majjhimaomesu, nava pattā bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:2350_0: Tasmā nāpi adhiṭṭhānaṃ, na gacchanti vikappanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2358_0: Yaṃ pattaṃ na vikappeti, yaṃ nādhiṭṭheti vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2373_0: Yo hi nissaggiyaṃ pattaṃ, anissajjeva bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:2388_0: Yaṃ kiñci sodakaṃ pattaṃ, paṭisāmeyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2391_0: Bhikkhuno sodakaṃ pattaṃ, otāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2394_0: Miḍḍhante paribhaṇḍante, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2395_0: Miḍḍhiyā paribhaṇḍe vā, vitthiṇṇe pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2406_0: Daṇḍe vā nāgadante vā, laggetumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2413_0: Bhattapūropi vā chatte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2416_0: Kavāṭaṃ na paṇāmeyya, pattahattho sace pana;
tika-vin10t:2422_0: Pattaṃ paṭiggahaṃ katvā, dhovituṃ hatthameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2423_0: Mukhato nīhaṭaṃ patte, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2425_0: Anāpatti dasāhassa, antoyeva ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2432_0: Pañcabandhanaūnasmiṃ, patte sati ca yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2433_0: Viññāpeyya navaṃ pattaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2438_0: Pañca vā rājiyo yassa, ekā vāpi dasaṅgulā;
tika-vin10t:2439_0: Apatto nāmayaṃ patto, viññāpeyya tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:2442_0: Baddho vaṭṭati maṭṭho ce, ayocuṇṇena vāṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:2444_0: Pattaṃ saṅghassa nissaṭṭhaṃ, tassa nissaggiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:2447_0: Dīyamāne tu pattasmiṃ, yassa so na ca ruccati;
tika-vin10t:2448_0: Appicchatāya vā pattaṃ, taṃ na gaṇhāti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2455_0: Sace so taṃ jigucchanto, appadese ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t:2458_0: Naṭṭhe bhinnepi vā patte, anāpatti pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t:2459_0: Attano ñātakādīnaṃ, gaṇhato vā dhanena vā.
tika-vin10t:2468_0: Tato paṭṭhāya sattāhaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2475_0: Sarīrabhoge netabbaṃ, sāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2480_0: Sayaṃ tāpeti ce bhikkhu, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2481_0: Tāpanaṃ navanītassa, sāmapāko na hoti so.
tika-vin10t:2483_0: Pacchābhattaṃ gahetvā ce, yena kenaci tāpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2484_0: Vaṭṭateva ca taṃ sappi, sattāhampi nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2491_0: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ;
tika-vin10t:2501_0: Khīraṃ dadhi ca sappi ca, navanītañca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2503_0: “Yesaṃ kappati maṃsañhi, tesaṃ sappī”ti kiṃ idaṃ?
tika-vin10t:2513_0: Telaṃ vā navanītaṃ vā, sappiṃ vā ākiranti hi.
tika-vin10t:2515_0: Bhattasitthāni vā tattha, taṇḍulā vā bhavanti ce;
tika-vin10t:2530_0: Attanā yaṃ kataṃ telaṃ, taṃ vaṭṭati nirāmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2546_0: Vasānaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, telaṃ pañcavidhaṃ bhave.
tika-vin10t:2554_0: Sace anupasampanno, katvā taṃ deti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2557_0: Paṭiggahetuṃ kātuṃ vā, pacchābhattaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2569_0: Phāṇitaṃ tu purebhattaṃ, gahitaṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2576_0: Pacchābhattakato uddhaṃ, taṃ na vaṭṭati sāyituṃ.
tika-vin10t:2579_0: Hoti tassa anāpatti, pacchābhattaṃ katepi ca.
tika-vin10t:2582_0: Tadahe deti ce katvā, sāmisampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2591_0: Pakkhipitvā kataṃ khīraṃ, hoti taṃ yāvakālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2599_0: Labhitvā pana nissaṭṭhaṃ, taṃ tu sattāhakālikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2600_0: Aruādīni makkhetuṃ, sāyituṃ vā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2602_0: Aññassa pana bhikkhussa, kāyabhoge ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2619_0: Tesuyeva ca viññattiṃ, katvā nipphādane tathā.
tika-vin10t:2627_0: Ovassāpeti ce kāyaṃ, naggo satipi cīvare;
tika-vin10t:2640_0: Sāmaṃ tu cīvaraṃ datvā, acchindantassa taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:2652_0: Āṇāpeti sace aññaṃ, bhikkhuṃ gaṇhāti cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:2656_0: Ekāyassa ca vācāya, honti āpattiyo bahū.
tika-vin10t:2670_0: So vā deti sace tuṭṭho, duṭṭho vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t:2687_0: Vīte nissaggiyaṃ vuttaṃ, phalake phalakepi ca.
tika-vin10t:2698_0: Sace akappiyaṃ suttaṃ, vāreneva vinanti te;
tika-vin10t:2704_0: Dvepi vemaṃ gahetvā vā, ekato vā vinanti ce;
tika-vin10t:2718_0: Vikappaṃ cīvare bhikkhu, āpajjati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2734_0: Vassacchedo na kātabbo, saṅghikaṃ taṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t:2742_0: Atthate kathine tassa, pañca māsā pakāsitā;
tika-vin10t:2750_0: Ṭhapetvā cīvaraṃ gāme, paccaye sati tādise.
tika-vin10t:2753_0: Uttariṃ vasato doso, vinā saṅghassa sammutiṃ.
tika-vin10t:2761_0: Yaṃ gāmaṃ gocaraṃ katvā, bhikkhu āraññake vase;
tika-vin10t:2762_0: Tasmiṃ gāme ṭhapetuṃ taṃ, māsamekaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2770_0: Gāmasīmampi vā gantvā, vasitvā yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t:2771_0: Cīvarassa pavattiṃ so, ñatvā gacchati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:2774_0: Khippaṃ paccuddhare ṭhāne, atireke hi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:2783_0: Jānaṃ pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, bhikkhusaṅghassa yo pana;
tika-vin10t:2789_0: Cīvaraṃ vā parasseka-mekaṃ vā pana attano;
tika-vin10t:2790_0: Pariṇāmeyya ce saddhiṃ, dve pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:2792_0: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, taṃ gahetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:2795_0: Cetiyassa ca saṅghassa, puggalassapi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2821_0: Bhūtena vā abhūtena, yena kenaci vatthunā.
tika-vin10t:2823_0: Yāya kāyaci bhāsāya, hatthamuddāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:2851_0: Na ceva piyakāmassa, na ca bhedatthinopi vā;
tika-vin10t:2859_0: Dhammaṃ saha bhaṇantassa, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2864_0: Dukkaṭaṃ hoti bhikkhusmiṃ, tathā bhikkhuniyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:2867_0: Ekato uddisāpeti, sajjhāyaṃ vā karoti yo;
tika-vin10t:2868_0: Bhaṇantaṃ paguṇaṃ ganthaṃ, opāteti ca yo pana.
tika-vin10t:2871_0: Uddesaṃ tu anāpatti, bhaṇane tena ekato.
tika-vin10t:2880_0: Tissannaṃ pana rattīnaṃ, uddhaṃ yo pana rattiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2881_0: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuṃ aññena, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2883_0: Vatthuṃ yaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, methunassa pahonakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2887_0: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, sace bhikkhu nipajjati.
tika-vin10t:2892_0: Sace pidhāya vā gabbhaṃ, nipajjatipidhāya vā;
tika-vin10t:2907_0: Anāpatti dirattaṃ vā, tirattaṃ vasato saha;
tika-vin10t:2921_0: Rattiyaṃ yo nipajjeyya, deviyā paṇḍakena vā.
tika-vin10t:2931_0: Vinā dhammaṃ bhaṇantassa, hoti pācitti itthiyā.
tika-vin10t:2936_0: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, padādīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:2942_0: Ṭhitassa mātugāmassa, dhammaṃ yo pana bhāsati;
tika-vin10t:2943_0: Channaṃ upari vācānaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2946_0: Uttari chahi vācāhi, vadato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:2951_0: Purise sati viññusmiṃ, sayaṃ uṭṭhāya vā puna;
tika-vin10t:2954_0: Aññissā puna aññissā, itthiyā bhaṇatopi ca;
tika-vin10t:2962_0: Ṭhapetvā bhikkhuniṃ bhikkhuṃ, bhūte pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:2964_0: No ce jānāti so vuttaṃ, ārocentassa bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:2973_0: Kāyato vācato kāya-vācato ca tidhā siyā;
tika-vin10t:2984_0: Tasmā suddhassa duṭṭhullaṃ, vadaṃ pācittiyaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:2992_0: Vatthuṃ vā pana āpattiṃ, ārocentassa kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:2999_0: Khaṇeyya vā khaṇāpeyya, pathaviṃ yo akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3000_0: Bhedāpeyya ca bhindeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3009_0: Iccevaṃ tu vadantassa, koci doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3011_0: “Imaṃ khaṇa ca okāsaṃ, idha pokkharaṇiṃ khaṇa;
tika-vin10t:3012_0: Imasmiṃ khaṇa okāse”, vattumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3014_0: “Kandaṃ khaṇa kurundaṃ vā, thūṇaṃ khaṇa ca khāṇukaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3015_0: Mūlaṃ khaṇa ca tālaṃ vā”, evaṃ vadati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3017_0: “Imaṃ mūlaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ tālaṃ imaṃ naḷaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3018_0: Khaṇā”ti niyametvāna, vattuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3021_0: Bhikkhunā apanetabbo, bahalaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3026_0: Sace patati toyasmiṃ, deve vuṭṭhepi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3029_0: Pāsāṇapiṭṭhiyaṃ soṇḍiṃ, khaṇanti yadi tattha tu;
tika-vin10t:3030_0: Rajaṃ patati ce pubbaṃ, pacchā devobhivassati.
tika-vin10t:3035_0: Vārinā paṭhamaṃ puṇṇe, pacchā patati ce rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3036_0: Taṃ vaṭṭati vikopetuṃ, toye devo hi vassati.
tika-vin10t:3044_0: Abbhokāse sace vaṭṭho, cātumāsaṃ tu vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3063_0: Anovaṭṭho ca bhikkhūnaṃ, sabbadā hoti kappiyo.
tika-vin10t:3065_0: Vuṭṭhe puna ca gehasmiṃ, gehaṃ chādenti taṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:3068_0: Yattakaṃ tattha tintaṃ tu, tattakaṃ hotyakappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3069_0: Atintaṃ tattha yaṃ yaṃ tu, taṃ taṃ hoti hi kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3071_0: Temito vārinā so ce, ekābaddhova bhūmiyā;
tika-vin10t:3072_0: Pathavī ceva sā jātā, na vaṭṭati tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:3077_0: Tattha laggaṃ rajaṃ saṇhaṃ, aghaṃsantova mattaso;
tika-vin10t:3081_0: Ṭhāne tiṭṭhati so tasmā, vikopeyya yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3083_0: Abbhokāse ṭhitaṃ thambhaṃ, cāletvā panito cito;
tika-vin10t:3084_0: Pathaviṃ tu vikopetvā, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3086_0: Aññampi sukkharukkhaṃ vā, khāṇukaṃ vāpi gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:3087_0: Ayameva nayo doso, ujumuddharato na ca.
tika-vin10t:3089_0: Pāsāṇaṃ yadi vā rukkhaṃ, uccāletvā pavaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3090_0: Na doso suddhacittassa, sace pathavi bhijjati.
tika-vin10t:3095_0: Kaṇṭakaṃ sūcimaṭṭhiṃ vā, khilaṃ vā bhūmiyaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:3096_0: Ākoṭetuṃ pavesetuṃ, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3099_0: Bhikkhussa pana passāva-mevaṃ kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3102_0: Samajjato samaṃ kātuṃ, ghaṃsituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3104_0: Pādaṅguṭṭhena vā bhūmiṃ, likhitumpi na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3105_0: Bhindantena ca pādehi, tathā caṅkamitumpi vā.
tika-vin10t:3108_0: Aghaṃsanto gahetvā ce, hatthaṃ dhovati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3110_0: Sayaṃ dahati ce bhūmiṃ, dahāpeti parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:3113_0: Ṭhānesu yattakesvaggiṃ, deti dāpeti vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3116_0: Ṭhapetuṃ bhikkhuno aggiṃ, bhūmiyaṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3119_0: Aggiṃ upari dārūnaṃ, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3120_0: Dahanto tāni gantvā so, bhūmiṃ dahati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:3126_0: Khāṇuke sukkharukkhe vā, aggiṃ dātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3128_0: Anāpatti tiṇukkaṃ tu, gahetvā pana gacchato;
tika-vin10t:3129_0: Ḍayhamāne tu hatthasmiṃ, sace pāteti bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3131_0: Puna taṃ patitaṭṭhāne, datvā tassa panindhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3145_0: Udakaṭṭho thalaṭṭhoti, duvidho hoti so pana;
tika-vin10t:3149_0: Vikopentassa taṃ sabbaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3151_0: Viyūhitvā tu hatthena, nhāyituṃ pana vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3152_0: Hoti tassa ca sabbampi, ṭhānañhi sakalaṃ jalaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3154_0: Udakena vinā cecca, taṃ panuddharituṃ jalā;
tika-vin10t:3155_0: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhussa, ṭhānasaṅkamanañhi taṃ.
tika-vin10t:3161_0: Vikopentassa vā tattha, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3164_0: Gacchanti hi yato tāni, bījagāmena saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3170_0: Tasmā tassa kato hoti, bījagāmena saṅgaho.
tika-vin10t:3173_0: Aphalitāya yo khāṇu, bhūtagāmena so mato.
tika-vin10t:3175_0: Phalitā kadalī yāva, nīlapaṇṇā ca tāva sā;
tika-vin10t:3178_0: Aggato pana paṭṭhāya, yadāyaṃ veḷu sussati;
tika-vin10t:3187_0: Mūlamattepi vā yesaṃ, paṇṇamattepi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3191_0: Pattavaṭṭi yadā nīlā, niggacchati tadā na ca.
tika-vin10t:3204_0: Vandākā vāpi aññaṃ vā, rukkhe jāyati yaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:3206_0: Rukkhovassa siyā ṭhānaṃ, vikopetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3210_0: Yāva dve tīṇi pattāni, na sañjāyanti tāva so.
tika-vin10t:3212_0: Pattesu pana jātesu, vatthu pācittiyassa so;
tika-vin10t:3213_0: Ghaṃsitvā pana taṃ tasmā, apanetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3222_0: Sace taṃ makuḷaṃ hoti, hoti dukkaṭavatthukaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3224_0: Rukkhe tacaṃ vikopetvā, tathā pappaṭikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:3225_0: Niyyāsampi panallasmiṃ, gahetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3230_0: Pupphaṃ paṇḍupalāsaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā pakkameva vā;
tika-vin10t:3233_0: Nāmetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, dātuṃ vaṭṭati gaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:3234_0: Sayaṃ khāditukāmo ce, dātumevaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3239_0: Yesaṃ ruhati rukkhānaṃ, sākhā tesampi sākhinaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3245_0: “Rukkhaṃ chinda lataṃ chinda, kandaṃ mūlampi uddhara;
tika-vin10t:3248_0: “Ambaṃ jambumpi nimbaṃ vā, chinda bhinduddharā”ti vā;
tika-vin10t:3251_0: “Imaṃ rukkhaṃ imaṃ valliṃ, imaṃ challiṃ imaṃ lataṃ;
tika-vin10t:3252_0: Chinda bhindā”ti vā vattuṃ, niyametvā na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3255_0: Sabbameva kataṃ hoti, ekasmiṃ kappiye kate.
tika-vin10t:3257_0: Ekato pana baddhāni, ucchudārūni honti ce;
tika-vin10t:3258_0: Kappiyaṃ karonto pana, dāruṃ vijjhati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3260_0: Valliyā rajjuyā vāpi, yāya baddhāni tāni hi;
tika-vin10t:3261_0: Bhājanena samānattā, taṃ vijjhati na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3269_0: Kaṭāhaṃ yadi muñcitvā, anto carati miñjakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3270_0: Bhindāpetvā kapitthaṃ taṃ, kāretabbaṃ tu kappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3286_0: Kamme aropite cevaṃ, vadantassa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3305_0: Vadato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, yassa kassaci santike.
tika-vin10t:3311_0: Ajjhokāse tu mañcādiṃ, attano vā parassa vā;
tika-vin10t:3314_0: Nevuddhareyya saṅghassa, uddharāpeyya vā na taṃ;
tika-vin10t:3315_0: Pakkamanto sace tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3317_0: Vassike caturo māse, sace devo na vassati;
tika-vin10t:3318_0: Ajjhokāse tathā cāpi, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3320_0: Yattha vassati hemante, cattāro aparepi ca;
tika-vin10t:3321_0: Ṭhapetuṃ tattha mañcādiṃ, aṭṭha māse na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3324_0: Mañcādiṃ pana saṅghassa, ṭhapetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3326_0: Aññassatthāya yaṃ kiñci, santhataṃ yadi saṅghikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3327_0: Yattha katthaci vā ṭhāne, yena kenaci bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:3329_0: Yāva so na nisīdeyya, “gacchā”ti na vadeyya vā;
tika-vin10t:3335_0: Santhataṃ bhikkhunā taṃ ce, bhāro tasseva tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:3336_0: Yāva āṇāpako tattha, āgantvā na nisīdati.
tika-vin10t:3347_0: Nikkhamitvā sace tasmā, ṭhānā aññattha gacchati;
tika-vin10t:3357_0: Abbhokāse ṭhapetvā taṃ, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3359_0: Sace āraññakenāpi, anovasse ca no sati;
tika-vin10t:3360_0: Laggetvā pana rukkhasmiṃ, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3362_0: Yathā upacikādīhi, na khajjati na lujjati;
tika-vin10t:3363_0: Tathā katvāpi taṃ sabbaṃ, gantuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3378_0: Etaṃ dasavidhaṃ seyyaṃ, santharitvāpi vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3382_0: Paṭhame dukkaṭaṃ pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:3396_0: Sāpekkhova ca gantvā taṃ, tattha ṭhatvāpi pucchati;
tika-vin10t:3400_0: Yo pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ, jānaṃ anupakhajja ca;
tika-vin10t:3404_0: Yāva taṃ mañcapīṭhaṃ vā, nikkhamantassa vā pana.
tika-vin10t:3412_0: Nisīdantassa vā tattha, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3422_0: Sabbattha dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, nivāso ca nivārito.
tika-vin10t:3431_0: Vihārā saṅghikā bhikkhuṃ, nikkaḍḍheyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3432_0: Nikkaḍḍhāpeyya vā kuddho, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3435_0: Nikkaḍḍheti sace tassa, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:3437_0: Ṭhapetvā ca ṭhapetvā ca, nikkaḍḍhantassa antarā;
tika-vin10t:3443_0: Sace so sakimāṇatto, dvārepi bahuke pana;
tika-vin10t:3447_0: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, tathā nikkaḍḍhanepi ca.
tika-vin10t:3466_0: Āhaccapādake mañce, pīṭhe vā pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3468_0: Nisīdantassa vā tasmiṃ, nipajjantassa vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3472_0: Heṭṭhā aparibhoge vā, sīsaghaṭṭāya vā pana.
tika-vin10t:3477_0: Yattha paṭāṇi vā dinnā, tattha ṭhatvā lageti vā;
tika-vin10t:3487_0: Adhiṭṭheyyaṃ tato uddhaṃ, adhiṭṭheti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3488_0: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, dukkaṭaṃ tattha tiṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t:3491_0: Yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ bhikkhuṃ, olokento na passati.
tika-vin10t:3493_0: Tasmiṃ ṭhāne pana ṭhātuṃ, neva bhikkhussa vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:3499_0: Na doso dvattipariyāye, leṇe tiṇakuṭīsu vā;
tika-vin10t:3503_0: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ toyaṃ, tiṇaṃ vā mattikampi vā;
tika-vin10t:3504_0: Yadi siñceyya pācitti, siñcāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t:3506_0: Acchinditvā sace dhāraṃ, mattikaṃ siñcato pana;
tika-vin10t:3512_0: Ekāva ce siyāpatti, divasampi ca sandatu;
tika-vin10t:3519_0: Khayaṃ vā āvilattaṃ vā, jalaṃ gacchati tādise.
tika-vin10t:3547_0: Osārentova te dhamme, ovadeyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3563_0: Ṭhapetvā dukkaṭaṃ bālaṃ, gilānaṃ gamikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3565_0: Adhamme pana kammasmiṃ, adhammanti ca saññino;
tika-vin10t:3569_0: Nava pācittiyo vuttā, samaggepi ca tattakā.
tika-vin10t:3571_0: Navakānaṃ vasā dvinnaṃ, aṭṭhārasa bhavanti tā;
tika-vin10t:3574_0: “Osārehī”ti vutto vā, pañhaṃ puṭṭho katheti vā;
tika-vin10t:3590_0: Catūsvapi nikāyesu, eko vā potthakopi ca.
tika-vin10t:3622_0: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, sace vadati tīṇipi.
tika-vin10t:3641_0: Vadato sammate bhikkhu, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3653_0: Sace bhikkhuniyā bhikkhu, dadeyya pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:3659_0: Tattha bhikkhuniyā dinnaṃ, cīvaraṃ idha bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:3663_0: Cīvaraṃ yo hi sibbeyya, sibbāpeyya parena vā;
tika-vin10t:3666_0: Yaṃ vā nivāsituṃ sakkā, yaṃ vā pārupanūpagaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3669_0: Sayaṃ sūciṃ pavesetvā, sibbantassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:3673_0: Ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, payogassa vasā bahū.
tika-vin10t:3676_0: Niṭṭhāpeti sace sabbaṃ, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3678_0: “Yamettha cīvare kammaṃ, bhāro sabbaṃ tavā”ti hi;
tika-vin10t:3679_0: Āṇatto bhikkhunā sabbaṃ, niṭṭhāpeti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:3685_0: Kā hi nāma kathā atthi? Tikapācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3698_0: Paṭipajjeyya maggaṃ ce, aññatra samayā idha.
tika-vin10t:3701_0: Agāmake araññe vā, hoti āpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3743_0: Tathā saṃvidahitvā vā, tiriyaṃ taraṇāya vā;
tika-vin10t:3750_0: Bhojanaṃ pañcadhā vuttaṃ, gahaṇe tassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3762_0: Aññaṃ vā pana yaṃ kiñci, ṭhapetvā pañcabhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3778_0: Bhuñjitabbaṃ sakiṃ tattha, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:3780_0: Dutiye divase tattha, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:3786_0: Nānāṭṭhānesu paññatto, yo ca, nānākulehi vā;
tika-vin10t:3787_0: Bhuñjato pana sabbattha, na doso paṭipāṭiyā.
tika-vin10t:3790_0: Ādito pana paṭṭhāya, na ca kappati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:3793_0: Odissapi ca paññatte, paritte bhuñjato sakiṃ.
tika-vin10t:3800_0: Gaṇoti pana niddiṭṭhā, cattāro vā tatuttariṃ.
tika-vin10t:3802_0: Yaṃ nimantanato vāpi, laddhaṃ viññattitopi vā;
tika-vin10t:3803_0: Bhojanaṃ pana pañcannaṃ, hoti aññataraṃ idha.
tika-vin10t:3806_0: Nimanteti sace bhikkhū, cattāro bahukepi vā.
tika-vin10t:3811_0: Tato tassa ca te bhikkhū, sādiyitvā nimantanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3812_0: Ekato nānato vā ce, gantvā gaṇhanti ekato.
tika-vin10t:3817_0: Ekato nānato vāpi, gamanaṃ bhojanampi vā;
tika-vin10t:3818_0: Kāraṇanti na taṃ viññū, bhaṇanti gaṇabhojane.
tika-vin10t:3823_0: Nānato vekato gantvā, sace gaṇhanti ekato;
tika-vin10t:3830_0: Gahetvā ekato dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā bhuñjataṃ tathā.
tika-vin10t:3839_0: Nattheva ca visaṅketaṃ, yāguādīsu taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:3859_0: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, yena kena nimantito;
tika-vin10t:3860_0: Taṃ ṭhapetvā sace aññaṃ, bhojanaṃ paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t:3865_0: Yattha khīraṃ rasaṃ vāpi, ākiranti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:3875_0: Nimantitassa vā nicca-bhatte doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:3882_0: Pātheyyatthāya manthā vā, ye hi tattha ca bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:3885_0: Tato ce uttariṃ tassa, hoti pācitti gaṇhato.
tika-vin10t:3888_0: Gahitā pana pūvā”ti, bhikkhuṃ disvā vade budho.
tika-vin10t:3891_0: Gaṇhatopi ca taṃ sutvā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3896_0: Yena tattha tayo laddhā, pattapūrā tato pana;
tika-vin10t:3897_0: Dve saṅghassa padātabbā, dve ce eko, na ekato.
tika-vin10t:3912_0: Odano sattu kummāso, maccho maṃsanti sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:3915_0: Odano tattha sattannaṃ, dhaññānaṃ odano mato;
tika-vin10t:3921_0: Sāli vīhi yavo kaṅgu, varako godhumo tathā;
tika-vin10t:3927_0: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, odano yāgu vā pana;
tika-vin10t:3930_0: Hatthena gahitokāse, odhiṃ dasseti yā pana;
tika-vin10t:3933_0: Abbhuṇhā pana yā yāgu, uddhanoropitā tanu;
tika-vin10t:3934_0: Sace odhiṃ na dasseti, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3936_0: Puna sā sītalībhūtā, ghanabhāvaṃ gatā sace;
tika-vin10t:3937_0: Odhiṃ dasseti so pubbe, tanubhāvo na rakkhati.
tika-vin10t:3943_0: Odhiṃ pana ca dasseti, sañjaneti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3946_0: “Yāguṃ gaṇhatha, yāgu”nti, vatvā denti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:3949_0: Taṃ pacitvā sace denti, yāgusaṅgahitā pana.
tika-vin10t:3960_0: Puthukā vā tato tāhi, katabhattampi sattupi;
tika-vin10t:3961_0: Suddhā na pana pūvā vā, pavārenti kadācipi.
tika-vin10t:3964_0: Koṭṭetvā denti taṃ cuṇṇaṃ, sattusaṅgahitaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:3966_0: Bhajjitānaṃ tu vīhīnaṃ, na pavārenti taṇḍulā;
tika-vin10t:3967_0: Tesaṃ pana ca yaṃ cuṇṇaṃ, taṃ janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3973_0: Kuṇḍakaṃ pana vīhīnaṃ, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3975_0: Lājā vā pana teheva, katabhattampi sattu vā;
tika-vin10t:3976_0: Khajjakaṃ pana suddhaṃ vā, na janeti pavāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3979_0: Yaṃ kiñci bhajjitaṃ piṭṭhaṃ, na pavāreti suddhakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3985_0: Na so tena pavāreti, avatthuttāti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3990_0: Maṃsaṃ pana ca khādanto, kappiyaṃ vā akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:3994_0: Nisedhaṃ na pavāreti, tathā aññaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:3997_0: Patte hatthe mukhe vāpi, bhojanaṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4000_0: Pavāreti sace natthi, na pavāreti katthaci.
tika-vin10t:4002_0: Gilitvā ca mukhe bhattaṃ, sesamādāya gacchati;
tika-vin10t:4003_0: Antarā ca nisedhento, na pavāreti bhojanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4010_0: Asanassa upacchedā, na pavāreti soti hi;
tika-vin10t:4013_0: Gaṇhato pacchimaṃ aṅgaṃ, dadato purimaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4014_0: Ubhinnaṃ aḍḍhateyyaṃ ce, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4019_0: Hatthe ādhārake vāpi, pattaṃ ūrūsu vā ṭhitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4029_0: Pidahanto sakaṃ pattaṃ, hatthehi na pavārito.
tika-vin10t:4032_0: Kāyena vāpi vācāya, hoti kassa pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4037_0: Sace vadati tassāpi, na panatthi pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4040_0: Samaṃsañhi rasaṃ netvā, gaṇhathāti rasaṃ vade;
tika-vin10t:4041_0: Taṃ sutvā ca nisedhento, neva hoti pavārito.
tika-vin10t:4046_0: Sace maṃsaṃ visuṃ katvā, “gaṇha maṃsarasa”nti vā;
tika-vin10t:4047_0: Vadeyyatthi ca maṃsaṃ ce, paṭikkhepe pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4055_0: Vadanti ce paṭikkhepe, neva hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4061_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, ñeyyo maṃsakarambake;
tika-vin10t:4070_0: “Yāgumissakaṃ gaṇhā”ti, vutte tattha ca yāgu ce;
tika-vin10t:4071_0: Samā bahutarā vā sā, na pavāreti so kira.
tika-vin10t:4073_0: Mandā yāgu, bahuṃ bhattaṃ, sace hoti pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:4074_0: Idaṃ sabbattha niddiṭṭhaṃ, kāraṇaṃ pana duddasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4076_0: Rasaṃ bahurase bhatte, khīraṃ vā bahukhīrake;
tika-vin10t:4077_0: Gaṇhathāti visuṃ katvā, deti natthi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:4082_0: Udakaṃ vāpi patvā so, sace tiṭṭhati kaddamaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4083_0: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tato puna.
tika-vin10t:4085_0: Pīṭhake yo nisīditvā, pavāreti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:4088_0: Sace mañce nisīditvā, pavāreti tato pana;
tika-vin10t:4089_0: Ito saṃsarituṃ etto, īsakampi na labbhati.
tika-vin10t:4091_0: Tena mañcena naṃ saddhiṃ, vaṭṭataññatra nenti ce;
tika-vin10t:4100_0: Kappiyaṃ pana kātabbaṃ, na patteyeva kevalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4101_0: Pacchiyaṃ yadi vā kuṇḍe, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhājane.
tika-vin10t:4109_0: Byañjanaṃ vāpi yaṃ kiñci, patte tassākiranti ce.
tika-vin10t:4111_0: Atirittaṃ tu kāretvā, bhuñjitabbaṃ tathā puna;
tika-vin10t:4112_0: Yena taṃ akataṃ yaṃ vā, kātabbaṃ tena taṃ visuṃ.
tika-vin10t:4117_0: Yopi pātova ekampi, sitthaṃ bhutvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:4134_0: Jānaṃ āsādanāpekkho, bhutte pācitti tassa tu.
tika-vin10t:4136_0: Dukkaṭaṃ abhihāre ca, gahaṇe itarassa hi;
tika-vin10t:4160_0: Mūlaṃ kandaṃ muḷālañca, matthakaṃ khandhakaṃ tacaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4161_0: Pattaṃ pupphaṃ phalaṃ aṭṭhi, piṭṭhaṃ niyyāsameva ca.
tika-vin10t:4170_0: Saṅgahaṃ idha gacchanti, āhāratthaṃ pharanti hi.
tika-vin10t:4172_0: Chaḍḍenti jaraṭṭhaṃ chetvā, yaṃ taṃ vajakalissa tu;
tika-vin10t:4205_0: Sattannaṃ pana dhaññānaṃ, kaḷīro sāsapassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4223_0: Vatthulo cīnamuggo ca, ummā vajakalī tathā.
tika-vin10t:4225_0: Jajjharī kāsamaddo ca, sellu siggu ca nāḷikā;
tika-vin10t:4228_0: Rājamāso ca māso ca, nipphāvo migapupphikā;
tika-vin10t:4241_0: Tathā pupphaṃ karīrassa, pupphaṃ varuṇakassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4261_0: Labujassa ca cocassa, mocassa madhukassa ca.
tika-vin10t:4287_0: Tālapiṭṭhaṃ tathā dhotaṃ, piṭṭhaṃ yaṃ khīravalliyā;
tika-vin10t:4306_0: Bhojanaṃ sannidhiṃ katvā, khādanaṃ vāpi yo pana;
tika-vin10t:4307_0: Bhuñjeyya vāpi khādeyya, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4310_0: Nidahitvā sace tassa, denti taṃ puna vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4313_0: Dutiye divase tassa, nihitaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4327_0: Thullaccayena saddhiṃ dve, maṃse mānusake siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:4328_0: Sese akappiye maṃse, dukkaṭena saha dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4334_0: Dvīsu tesu vikappesu, dukkaṭaṃ pana vaḍḍhati.
tika-vin10t:4354_0: Kālo yāmo ca sattāhaṃ, iti kālattayaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4355_0: Atikkamayato doso, kālaṃ taṃ taṃ tu kālikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4367_0: Gahitaṃ tadahe vāpi, dvayaṃ pubbaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4370_0: Iti vuttaṃ daḷhaṃ katvā, mahāpaccariyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:4373_0: Taṃ taṃ sakaṃ sakaṃ kāla-manatikkamma bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:4385_0: Viññāpetvā tathā taṃ ce, dukkaṭaṃ paṭigaṇhato;
tika-vin10t:4400_0: Yena yena hi viññattaṃ, tasmiṃ mūlepi tassa vā;
tika-vin10t:4401_0: Laddhepi pana taṃ laddhaṃ, hotiyeva na aññathā.
tika-vin10t:4409_0: Akappiyena vuttepi, sappinā deti tena ce;
tika-vin10t:4426_0: Manusso vāmanusso vā, deti kāyādinā tidhā.
tika-vin10t:4428_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ bhikkhu, dīyamānaṃ sace dvidhā;
tika-vin10t:4431_0: Dāyako gaganaṭṭho ce, bhūmaṭṭho cetaro siyā;
tika-vin10t:4435_0: Dātuṃ vāpi gahetuṃ vā, vinā hatthaṃ pasāritaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4438_0: Evarūpe pana ṭhāne, ṭhatvā ce deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4440_0: Pakkhī vā mukhatuṇḍena, hatthī soṇḍāya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4441_0: Sace yaṃ kiñci pupphaṃ vā, phalaṃ vā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4447_0: Tena hatthaṃ pasāretvā, heṭṭhimaṃ pana bhājanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4449_0: Paṭicchitabbaṃ taṃ eka- desenāpi ca bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4452_0: Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ sabbaṃ, oropetvā yathāsukhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4453_0: Ugghāṭetvā tato iṭṭhaṃ, gahetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4456_0: Kājabhattaṃ haranto ce, onatvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4458_0: Tiṃsahattho siyā veḷu, antesu ca duve ghaṭā;
tika-vin10t:4461_0: Bahupattā ca mañce vā, pīṭhe vā kaṭasārake;
tika-vin10t:4462_0: Ṭhapitā dāyako hattha-pāse ṭhatvāna deti ce.
tika-vin10t:4465_0: Nisīdati phusitvā yo, yañca pattesu dīyati.
tika-vin10t:4467_0: Gahitaṃ tena taṃ sabbaṃ, hotiyeva na saṃsayo;
tika-vin10t:4470_0: Gahitaṃ hoti taṃ sabbaṃ, āruhitvā nisīdati;
tika-vin10t:4471_0: Āhacca kucchiyā kucchiṃ, ṭhitā pattā hi bhūmiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4473_0: Yaṃ yaṃ aṅguliyā vāpi, phusitvā sūciyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:4474_0: Nisinno tattha tattheva, dīyamānaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4480_0: Na panetāni kāyena, paṭibaddhāni honti hi.
tika-vin10t:4483_0: Khāṇubaddhepi vā mañce, gahaṇaṃ neva rūhati.
tika-vin10t:4491_0: Sace patte rajo hoti, dhovitabbo jale sati;
tika-vin10t:4494_0: Piṇḍāya vicarantassa, rajaṃ patati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:4501_0: Asutvānādiyitvā vā, denti ce natthi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4504_0: Sace rajaṃ nipāteti, mahāvāto tato tato.
tika-vin10t:4506_0: Na sakkā ca siyā bhikkhaṃ, gahetuṃ yadi bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4509_0: Sāmaṇerassa taṃ datvā, dinnaṃ vā tena taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4510_0: Tassa vissāsato vāpi, bhuñjituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4512_0: Bhikkhācāre sace bhattaṃ, sarajaṃ deti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4513_0: “Paṭiggahetvā bhikkhaṃ tvaṃ, gaṇha vā bhuñja vā”ti ca.
tika-vin10t:4515_0: Vattabbo so tathā tena, kattabbañceva bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4516_0: Rajaṃ upari bhattassa, tassuplavati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:4519_0: Anto paṭiggahetabbaṃ, paviṭṭhaṃ tu sace pana.
tika-vin10t:4521_0: Patitaṃ sukkhabhatte ce, apanīyāva taṃ rajaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4525_0: Thevo uḷuṅkato patte, sace patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4527_0: Bhatte ākiramāne tu, carukena tato pana;
tika-vin10t:4528_0: Masi vā chārikā vāpi, sace patati bhājane.
tika-vin10t:4533_0: Uppabhitvā sace patte, itarassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4536_0: Pāyāsassa ca pūretvā, pattaṃ ce denti bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4537_0: Uṇhattā pana taṃ heṭṭhā, gahetuṃ na ca sakkati.
tika-vin10t:4540_0: Na sakkā ce gahetabbo, tathā ādhārakenapi.
tika-vin10t:4546_0: Ābhogaṃ pana katvā ce, nisinno hoti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4548_0: Sace hatthena muñcitvā, pattaṃ ādhārakampi vā;
tika-vin10t:4549_0: Pelletvā pana pādena, niddāyati hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4554_0: Tasmā taṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, bhikkhunā vinayaññunā;
tika-vin10t:4555_0: Yaṃ dīyamānaṃ patati, gahetuṃ taṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4557_0: Bhuñjantānañca dantā vā, khīyantipi nakhāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:4558_0: Tathā pattassa vaṇṇo vā, abbohāranayo ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4561_0: Paññāyati hi taṃ tesu, siyā navasamuṭṭhitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4563_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ pacchā, khāditabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:4564_0: Na paññāyati ce tasmiṃ, malaṃ vaṭṭati khādituṃ.
tika-vin10t:4569_0: Bhesajjatthāya tāpetvā, vāsiṃ khīre khipanti ce;
tika-vin10t:4570_0: Uṭṭheti nīlikā tattha, satthake viya nicchayo.
tika-vin10t:4572_0: Sace āmakatakke vā, khīre vā pakkhipanti taṃ;
tika-vin10t:4576_0: Patte patati ce toyaṃ, kiliṭṭhaṃ kāyavatthato.
tika-vin10t:4579_0: Eseva ca nayo vutto, rukkhamūlepi bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:4581_0: Sattāhaṃ pana vassante, deve suddhaṃ jalaṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:4582_0: Abbhokāsepi vā patte, toyaṃ patati vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4587_0: Paṭiggahetvā vā pattaṃ, dātabbo tassa odano;
tika-vin10t:4588_0: Chupitvā deti ce bhattaṃ, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4594_0: Sace vadati pacchā taṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t:4597_0: “Etto pūvampi bhattaṃ vā, kiñci gaṇhā”ti bhāsati.
tika-vin10t:4603_0: Taṃpaṭiggahaṇe kiccaṃ, puna tassa na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4612_0: Patitaṃ hatthato tasmiṃ, na karoti akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4615_0: Bhuñjitabbaṃ tu taṃ katvā, pattaṃ viya nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4617_0: Sace yāgukuṭaṃ puṇṇaṃ, sāmaṇero hi dubbalo;
tika-vin10t:4618_0: Bhikkhuṃ paṭiggahāpetuṃ, na sakkoti hi taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:4623_0: Atha vā bhūmiyaṃyeva, hatthe bhikkhu ṭhapeti ce;
tika-vin10t:4624_0: Āropeti pavaṭṭetvā, tattha ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4627_0: Dve tayo sāmaṇerā vā, denti ce gahaṇūpagaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4630_0: Ekena vā tathā dinnaṃ, gaṇhanti dve tayopi vā.
tika-vin10t:4636_0: Sammujjanto ca ghaṭṭeti, na panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4639_0: Gaṇhitvā puna taṃ ñatvā, ṭhapetuṃ tattha vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4641_0: Vivaritvā sace pubbe, ṭhapitaṃ pihitampi ca;
tika-vin10t:4642_0: Tatheva taṃ ṭhapetabbaṃ, kattabbaṃ na panaññathā.
tika-vin10t:4644_0: Bahi ṭhapeti ce tena, chupitabbaṃ na taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4645_0: Yadi chupati ce ñatvā, taṃ panuggahitaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:4651_0: Paṭiggahaṇakiccaṃ tu, tasmiṃ puna na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:4653_0: Tālaṃ vā nāḷikeraṃ vā, āruḷho koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t:4657_0: Tamañño pana bhūmaṭṭho, gahetvā deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4659_0: Chinditvā ce vatiṃ ucchuṃ, phalaṃ vā deti gaṇhituṃ;
tika-vin10t:4662_0: Sace na puthulo hoti, pākāro atiuccako;
tika-vin10t:4665_0: Uddhaṃ hatthasataṃ gantvā, sampattaṃ puna taṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4668_0: Bhikkhuno sāmaṇeraṃ tu, khandhena vahato sace;
tika-vin10t:4669_0: Phalaṃ gahetvā tattheva, nisinno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4671_0: Aparopi vahantova, bhikkhuṃ yo koci puggalo;
tika-vin10t:4672_0: Phalaṃ khandhe nisinnassa, bhikkhuno deti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4674_0: Gahetvā phaliniṃ sākhaṃ, chāyatthaṃ yadi gacchati;
tika-vin10t:4675_0: Puna citte samuppanne, khādituṃ pana bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4680_0: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, paṭiggaṇhāti taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:4684_0: Gacchanto antarāmagge, yaṃ icchati tato pana.
tika-vin10t:4692_0: Taṇḍulesu hi khīṇesu, attanā gahitesu so;
tika-vin10t:4696_0: Yāguṃ bhikkhussa taṃ datvā, sayaṃ pivati tassa ce.
tika-vin10t:4704_0: Tasmā hissa visesassa, cintetabbaṃ tu kāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4708_0: Na sakkoti sace te ca, taṇḍule bhājanampi ca.
tika-vin10t:4719_0: Tatte panudake koci, ce pakkhipati taṇḍule;
tika-vin10t:4720_0: Tato paṭṭhāya tenaggi, na kātabbova bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:4722_0: Paṭiggahetvā taṃ yāguṃ, pātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:4723_0: Sace pacati pacchā taṃ, sāmapākā na muccati.
tika-vin10t:4726_0: Tasseva ca tato laddhaṃ, phalaṃ kiñci na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4729_0: Kaṇṭake bandhituṃ vāpi, bhikkhuno kira vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4731_0: Saṇḍāsena ca dīghena, gahetvā thālakaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:4732_0: Pacato bhikkhuno telaṃ, bhasmaṃ patati tattha ce.
tika-vin10t:4737_0: Paṭiggahetvā aṅgāre, tāni dārūni vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4740_0: Ucchuṃ khādati ce bhikkhu, sāmaṇeropi icchati;
tika-vin10t:4741_0: “Chinditvā tvamito gaṇha”, iti vutto ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:4752_0: Udakena samā vuttā, himassa karakāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:4753_0: Kūpādīsu jalaṃ pātuṃ, bahalampi ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4755_0: Khettesu kasitaṭṭhāne, bahalaṃ taṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:4756_0: Sanditvā yadi taṃ gantvā, nadiṃ pūreti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4759_0: Na ñāyati raso tesaṃ, na paṭiggahaṇakāraṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4762_0: Pakkhittāni sace honti, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:4768_0: Ajānantassa pācitti, so ce visati khādato.
tika-vin10t:4770_0: Sarīraṭṭhesu bhūtesu, kiṃ vaṭṭati? Na vaṭṭati?
tika-vin10t:4774_0: Semhaṃ siṅghāṇikā kheḷo, assu loṇanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:4776_0: Yaṃ panettha sakaṭṭhānā, cavitvā patitaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:4777_0: Patte vā pana hatthe vā, paṭiggaṇheyya taṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:4818_0: Udakaṃ dantaponaṃ vā, dentassa ca atitthiye;
tika-vin10t:4819_0: Titthiyoti ca saññissa, dukkaṭaṃ vimatissa ca.
tika-vin10t:4828_0: Dāpetvā vā adāpetvā, bhikkhu yaṃ kiñci āmisaṃ;
tika-vin10t:4838_0: Pamāṇaṃ savane cevaṃ, ajjhokāse na cetare.
tika-vin10t:4848_0: Sabhojane kule tassa, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:4857_0: Vītarāgesu vā tesu, nikkhantesu ubhosu vā.
tika-vin10t:4863_0: Catutthe pañcame ceva, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:4864_0: Vattabbaṃ yañca taṃ sabbaṃ, vuttaṃ aniyatadvaye.
tika-vin10t:4870_0: Bhojanānaṃ tu pañcannaṃ, vutto aññatarena yo;
tika-vin10t:4873_0: Cārittaṃ tassa pācitti, aññatra samayā siyā;
tika-vin10t:4882_0: Ṭhitaṭṭhāne sace bhikkhuṃ, oloketvā na passati;
tika-vin10t:4885_0: Sace dūre ṭhito hoti, asanto nāma bhikkhu so;
tika-vin10t:4886_0: Natthi ārocane kiccaṃ, gavesitvā ito cito.
tika-vin10t:4888_0: Na doso samaye santaṃ, āpucchitvā ca gacchato;
tika-vin10t:4889_0: Bhikkhuṃ gharena maggo ce, ārāmaṃ gacchatopi ca.
tika-vin10t:4894_0: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:4902_0: Na paṭikkhipitabbā sā, “rogo dāni na me”ti ca.
tika-vin10t:4908_0: Tato aññehi vā bhiyyo, ācikkhitvā yathātathaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4918_0: Aññatra paccayā tassa, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade.
tika-vin10t:4923_0: Ārohā pana cattāro, dve dve taṃpādarakkhakā;
tika-vin10t:4924_0: Evaṃ dvādasaposo ca, eko hatthīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t:4927_0: Eko sārathi yodheko, āṇirakkhā duve janā.
tika-vin10t:4930_0: Cattāro padahatthā ca, purisā pattīti vuccati.
tika-vin10t:4938_0: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, sampattaṃ pana passati;
tika-vin10t:4945_0: Ākāse iddhiyā seyyaṃ, pakappetu ca iddhimā;
tika-vin10t:4955_0: Uyyodhikaṃ balaggaṃ vā, senābyūhampi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:4961_0: Sesesupi ca eseva, nayo ñeyyo vibhāvinā;
tika-vin10t:4966_0: Piṭṭhādīhi kataṃ majjaṃ, surā nāmāti vuccati;
tika-vin10t:4967_0: Pupphādīhi kato sabbo, āsavo hoti merayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:4970_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:5002_0: Nimujjeyyapi vā bhikkhu, ummujjeyya tareyya vā.
tika-vin10t:5004_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5010_0: Yena yena panaṅgena, bhikkhuno tarato jalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5013_0: Taruto tīrato vāpi, pācitti patato jale;
tika-vin10t:5016_0: Pājentopi sace nāvaṃ, arittena phiyena vā;
tika-vin10t:5017_0: Ussārentopi tīre vā, nāvaṃ kīḷati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5019_0: Hatthena vāpi pādena, kaṭṭhena kathalāya vā;
tika-vin10t:5022_0: Udakaṃ kañjikaṃ vāpi, cikkhallaṃ vāpi vikkhipaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5054_0: Disvā vā pana taṃ sutvā, mā vā bhāyatu, bhāyatu;
tika-vin10t:5055_0: Itarassa tu bhikkhussa, hoti pācitti taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:5064_0: Jotiṃ tappetukāmo ce, jalāpeyya jaleyya vā;
tika-vin10t:5065_0: Ṭhapetvā hoti pācitti, tathārūpaṃ tu paccayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5067_0: Sayaṃ samādahantassa, yāva jālā na jāyati;
tika-vin10t:5077_0: Anāpatti gilānassa, kataṃ aññena vā pana.
tika-vin10t:5083_0: Apuṇṇe addhamāsasmiṃ, dese ce majjhime pana;
tika-vin10t:5090_0: Dukkaṭaṃ atirekaddha- māse ca samayesu ca.
tika-vin10t:5099_0: Cīvaraṃ yaṃ nivāsetuṃ, sakkā pārupitumpi vā;
tika-vin10t:5103_0: Yena kenaci kāḷena, kaddamenapi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:5108_0: Pāḷikaṇṇikakappo vā, na ca vaṭṭati katthaci;
tika-vin10t:5109_0: Ekaṃ vāpi anekaṃ vā, bindu vaṭṭati vaṭṭakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5114_0: Kappe naṭṭhepi vā saddhiṃ, tena saṃsibbitesu vā;
tika-vin10t:5125_0: Kappatettāvatā kāmaṃ, nidhetuṃ, na ca kappati.
tika-vin10t:5134_0: Yassa kassaci nāmaṃ tu, gahetvā sahadhamminaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5139_0: “Tissassa bhikkhuno vā tvaṃ, tassā tissāya theriyā;
tika-vin10t:5146_0: Puna tenapi vattabbaṃ, “ko te mitto”ti bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:5151_0: Tissāya theriyā vā tvaṃ, santakaṃ paribhuñja vā;
tika-vin10t:5152_0: Vissajjehī”ti vā vutte, hoti paccuddhaṭaṃ puna.
tika-vin10t:5154_0: Iccetāsu pana dvīsu, yāya kāyaci cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5158_0: Yena taṃ vinayaṃ kammaṃ, kataṃ panidha bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:5210_0: Dhovato pana pattaṃ vā, nibbāpentassa yāguyo.
tika-vin10t:5212_0: Hatthena taṃ uḷuṅkena, gahetvā nhāyatopi vā;
tika-vin10t:5213_0: Payoge ca payoge ca, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t:5225_0: Siñcane siñcanaṃ vuttaṃ, paribhoge idaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:5227_0: Ayameva visesoti, tassa ceva panassa ca;
tika-vin10t:5235_0: Vadatā pana taṃ kammaṃ, uccāletuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5237_0: Sace vippakate kamme, paṭikkosati taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:5243_0: “Adhammena ca vaggena, na ca kammārahassa vā;
tika-vin10t:5244_0: Kata”nti jānato natthi, doso ukkoṭane pana.
tika-vin10t:5254_0: Āroceti sacaññassa, sopi aññassa vāti hi.
tika-vin10t:5256_0: Evaṃ satampi bhikkhūnaṃ, sahassampi ca tāva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:5257_0: Āpajjateva āpattiṃ, yāva koṭi na chijjati.
tika-vin10t:5269_0: Na ca chādetukāmo vā, sabhāgaṃ vā na passati.
tika-vin10t:5279_0: Tassa pācittiyaṃ hoti, sesānaṃ hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5287_0: Muñcitvā pana taṃ bhikkhuṃ, gaṇo ce paripūrati;
tika-vin10t:5288_0: Honti te sūpasampannā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:5290_0: Upajjhāyo sace hutvā, gaṇaṃ ācariyampi vā;
tika-vin10t:5291_0: Pariyesati pattaṃ vā, sammannati ca māḷakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5294_0: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīsu, kammavācāsu dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5307_0: Maggaṃ gacchati saddhiṃ yo, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5309_0: Gamane saṃvidhāne ca, vattabbo yo vinicchayo;
tika-vin10t:5310_0: So ca bhikkhunivaggasmiṃ, vuttattā na ca uddhaṭo.
tika-vin10t:5329_0: Kammaṃ kileso pāko ca, upavādo atikkamo;
tika-vin10t:5335_0: Tikkhattuṃ tehi vattabbo, ye passanti suṇanti ca;
tika-vin10t:5336_0: “Mā hevaṃ avacāyasmā”, iti bhikkhūhi so pana.
tika-vin10t:5339_0: Ñattiyā ca tathā dvīhi, kammavācāhi dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5349_0: Saṃvaseyya ca bhuñjeyya, pācitti saha seyya vā.
tika-vin10t:5351_0: Uposathādikaṃ kammaṃ, karoto saha tena hi;
tika-vin10t:5355_0: Dadatopi tathā ekaṃ, bahūni ca bahūsvapi.
tika-vin10t:5357_0: Ukkhittake nipannasmiṃ, itaro seti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:5358_0: Itarasmiṃ nipanne vā, paro seti ubhopi vā.
tika-vin10t:5367_0: Nissaṭṭhoti ca taṃ diṭṭhiṃ, saññissosāritoti ca.
tika-vin10t:5373_0: Tathā vināsitaṃ jānaṃ, upalāpeyya tena vā;
tika-vin10t:5383_0: Na hettha kiñci vattabbaṃ, sabbaṃ uttānamevidaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5387_0: Vuccamāno hi bhikkhūhi, bhikkhu sikkhāpadena yo;
tika-vin10t:5417_0: Kāretabbo tathā bhikkhu, yathā dhammo ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t:5422_0: Evaṃ āropite mohe, yadi moheti yo pana;
tika-vin10t:5423_0: Tasmiṃ mohanake vuttā, pācitti pana puggale.
tika-vin10t:5435_0: Kuddho deti pahāraṃ ce, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5438_0: Dinne bhijjatu sīsaṃ vā, pādo vā paribhijjatu;
tika-vin10t:5439_0: So ce maratu vā, mā vā, pācitti paridīpitā.
tika-vin10t:5442_0: Kaṇṇaṃ vā tassa nāsaṃ vā, yadi chindati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5450_0: Pahāraṃ deti mokkhādhi-ppāyo doso na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:5456_0: Iti vatvā panāyantaṃ, “gaccha re”ti ca muggaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5457_0: Satthaṃ vāpi gahetvā vā, paharitvā tu yāti ce.
tika-vin10t:5459_0: Anāpatti sace tena, pahārena matepi ca;
tika-vin10t:5466_0: Kāyaṃ vā kāyabaddhaṃ vā, uccāreyya sace pana;
tika-vin10t:5469_0: Uggiritvā viraddho so, pahāraṃ deti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:5472_0: Sace tena pahārena, pahaṭassa ca bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:5473_0: Hatthādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, aṅgaṃ bhijjati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5492_0: Hoti vācāya vācāya, pācitti pana bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:5499_0: Vikāle ca tayā bhuttaṃ, mā eva”nti ca bhāsato.
tika-vin10t:5505_0: Sace bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ, bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhu yo;
tika-vin10t:5508_0: “Yaṃ ime tu bhaṇissanti, taṃ sossāmī”ti gacchato;
tika-vin10t:5527_0: Dhammikānaṃ tu kammānaṃ, chandaṃ datvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:5528_0: Pacchā khīyati pācitti, vācato vācato siyā.
tika-vin10t:5534_0: Ime kammaṃ karontī”ti, ñatvā khīyati tassa ca.
tika-vin10t:5541_0: Ṭhapitā ñatti vā niṭṭhaṃ, kammavācā na gacchati.
tika-vin10t:5543_0: Etasmiṃ antare kammaṃ, kopetuṃ parisāya hi;
tika-vin10t:5546_0: Adatvā jahite chandaṃ, tassa pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:5547_0: Dhammakamme adhamme ca, vimatissa ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5552_0: Gilāno vā gilānassa, karaṇīye na dosatā;
tika-vin10t:5559_0: Samaggena ca saṅghena, saddhiṃ datvāna cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:5560_0: Sammatassa hi bhikkhussa, pacchā khīyati yo pana.
tika-vin10t:5563_0: Tikapācittiyaṃ dhamma- kamme vuttaṃ tu cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:5586_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t:5587_0: Deviyā vāpi rañño vā, sace na viditāgamo.
tika-vin10t:5608_0: Sace kappiyavatthuṃ vā, vatthuṃ vāpi akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5615_0: “Na vaṭṭatī”ti vatvā taṃ, na nidhetabbameva tu.
tika-vin10t:5618_0: Palibodho hi nāmeso, ṭhapetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5637_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:5639_0: Atha sambahulā gāmaṃ, vikāle pavisanti ce;
tika-vin10t:5642_0: Gacchanti ce tato aññaṃ, tato aññanti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5643_0: Puna āpucchane kiccaṃ, natthi gāmasatepi ca.
tika-vin10t:5646_0: Pavisanti sace aññaṃ, pucchitabbaṃ tu antarā.
tika-vin10t:5648_0: Katvā kulaghare bhatta- kiccaṃ aññattha vā pana;
tika-vin10t:5649_0: Sace caritukāmo yo, sappibhikkhāya vā siyā.
tika-vin10t:5651_0: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu labbhati;
tika-vin10t:5652_0: Asante pana natthīti, gantabbaṃ tu yathāsukhaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5654_0: Otaritvā mahāvīthiṃ, bhikkhuṃ yadi ca passati;
tika-vin10t:5660_0: Āpucchitvāva gantabbaṃ, passe ce bhikkhu vijjati;
tika-vin10t:5680_0: Kārāpane ca karaṇe, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5685_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato;
tika-vin10t:5692_0: Navaṃ mañcampi pīṭhaṃ vā, kārāpentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5699_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, dukkaṭaṃ paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:5705_0: Uttānaṃ vāpi aṭṭaṃ vā, bandhitvā paribhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:5708_0: Mañcaṃ vā pana pīṭhaṃ vā, tūlonaddhaṃ kareyya yo;
tika-vin10t:5714_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, uddāletvā nisevato;
tika-vin10t:5722_0: Dvīsu ṭhānesu phāletvā, tassa tisso dasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:5740_0: Cīvaraṃ bhikkhu kāreyya, karaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5745_0: Dīghaso ca pamāṇena, nava tassa vidatthiyo;
tika-vin10t:5748_0: Aññena ca kataṃ laddhā, sevato dukkaṭaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t:5755_0: Yo cantaragharaṃ bhikkhu, paviṭṭhāya tu hatthato;
tika-vin10t:5756_0: Aññātikāya yaṃ kiñci, tassa bhikkhuniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:5764_0: Rathikāya sace ṭhatvā, deti bhikkhuni bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5765_0: Āpatti antarārāme, ṭhatvā gaṇhāti bhikkhu ce.
tika-vin10t:5771_0: Vīthiyādīsu ce ṭhatvā, na doso paṭigaṇhato.
tika-vin10t:5788_0: Gāmato nīharitvā vā, deti ce bahi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:5804_0: Anāpattittano bhattaṃ, padāpeti na deti ce;
tika-vin10t:5805_0: Tathā aññassa bhattaṃ vā, na dāpeti padeti ce.
tika-vin10t:5807_0: Yaṃ na dinnaṃ taṃ dāpeti, na dinnaṃ yattha vāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:5808_0: Tattha tampi ca sabbesaṃ, samaṃ dāpeti bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:5824_0: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5830_0: Nimantitassa vā bhikkhā, aññesaṃ tattha dīyati.
tika-vin10t:5832_0: Gharato nīharitvā vā, denti ce yattha katthaci;
tika-vin10t:5835_0: Anāgate hi bhikkhumhi, gharato paṭhamaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:5836_0: Nīharitvā sace dvāre, sampatte denti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5838_0: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca disvāva, nīharitvāna gehato;
tika-vin10t:5843_0: Ārāmaṃ upacāraṃ vā, pavisitvā sace pana.
tika-vin10t:5849_0: Tassa vā parivārampi, aññaṃ katvā bahuṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:5851_0: Yāguyā viditaṃ katvā, pūvaṃ bhattaṃ haranti ce;
tika-vin10t:5855_0: Haranti tena saddhiṃ ce, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati tampi ca.
tika-vin10t:5860_0: Yaṃ asaṃviditaṃ katvā, ābhataṃ pana taṃ bahi;
tika-vin10t:5863_0: Gantvā vā antarāmagge, gahetabbaṃ tu bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5888_0: Otāretvā nivatthabbaṃ, tato ūnaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5894_0: Ubho koṇe samaṃ katvā, sādaraṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5898_0: Tasmā ghare vihāre vā, kattabbaṃ parimaṇḍalaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5901_0: Gaṇṭhikaṃ paṭimuñcitvā, katvā koṇe ubho samaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5904_0: Tathā akatvā bhikkhussa, jattūnipi urampi ca;
tika-vin10t:5909_0: Hatthe piṇḍikamaṃsamhā, heṭṭhā pāde ubhopi ca.
tika-vin10t:5912_0: Hoti so suppaṭicchanno, doso vāsūpagassa na.
tika-vin10t:5915_0: Hatthaṃ vā pana pādaṃ vā, acālentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:5922_0: Yattha katthaci hi ṭṭhāne, ekasmiṃ antare ghare;
tika-vin10t:5925_0: Yo anādariyaṃ katvā, olokento tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t:5947_0: Gacchato dukkaṭaṃ hoti, tatheva ca nisīdato.
tika-vin10t:5949_0: Kāyaṃ bāhuñca sīsañca, paggahetvā ujuṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:5956_0: Khambhaṃ katvā sasīsaṃ vā, pārupitvāna gacchato;
tika-vin10t:5957_0: Dukkaṭaṃ muninā vuttaṃ, tathā ukkuṭikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:5962_0: Dutiye ca catutthe ca, chaṭṭhe vāsūpagassa tu;
tika-vin10t:5980_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:5983_0: Sese thūpīkataṃ sabbaṃ, vaṭṭateva na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:5985_0: Dvīsu pattesu bhattaṃ tu, gahetvā pattamekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:5986_0: Pūretvā yadi peseti, bhikkhūnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:5989_0: Orohati sace heṭṭhā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5992_0: Dinnaṃ ayāvakālittā, na taṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5995_0: Piṇḍapātaṃ sace denti, idaṃ thūpīkataṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:5997_0: Bhattassūpari paṇṇaṃ vā, thālakaṃ vāpi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6000_0: Paṭiggahetumevassa, taṃ tu sabbaṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6004_0: Paṭhamaṃ dutiyaṃ vutta-nayaṃ tu tatiye pana;
tika-vin10t:6007_0: Aññesaṃ attano bhattaṃ, ākiraṃ pana bhājane;
tika-vin10t:6011_0: Catutthe yaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, vuttaṃ pubbe asesato;
tika-vin10t:6018_0: Yo bhiyyokamyatāhetu, sūpaṃ vā byañjanampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6022_0: Viññattiyaṃ tu vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6023_0: Aṭṭhame pana ujjhāne, gilānopi na muccati.
tika-vin10t:6045_0: Mukhe ca sakalaṃ hatthaṃ, pakkhipantassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6046_0: Mukhe ca kabaḷaṃ katvā, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6048_0: Vacanaṃ yattakenassa, paripuṇṇaṃ na hoti hi;
tika-vin10t:6052_0: Vacanaṃ paripuṇṇaṃ ce, kathetuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6056_0: Makkaṭo viya gaṇḍe vā, katvā bhuñjeyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6067_0: Katvā evaṃ na bhottabbaṃ, saddaṃ “suru surū”ti ca;
tika-vin10t:6068_0: Hatthanillehakaṃ vāpi, na ca vaṭṭati bhuñjituṃ.
tika-vin10t:6070_0: Phāṇitaṃ ghanayāguṃ vā, gahetvā aṅgulīhi taṃ;
tika-vin10t:6077_0: Sāmisena tu hatthena, na ca pānīyathālakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6081_0: Santako pana saṅkho vā, sarāvaṃ vāpi thālakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6083_0: Tasmā na ca gahetabbaṃ, gaṇhato hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6091_0: Chattaṃ yaṃ kiñci hatthena, sarīrāvayavena vā;
tika-vin10t:6100_0: Satthapāṇī na hotāsiṃ, sannayhitvā ṭhito pana.
tika-vin10t:6103_0: Dhanuṃ sarena saddhiṃ vā, dhanuṃ vā sarameva vā;
tika-vin10t:6107_0: Sace deseti saddhammaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6110_0: Na gaṇhāti naro tāva, dhammaṃ deseyya vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6118_0: Sabbattha agilānassa, yāne vā sayanepi vā.
tika-vin10t:6121_0: Pīṭhe mañcepi vā ucce, nisinnena ṭhitena vā.
tika-vin10t:6123_0: Na ca vaṭṭati desetuṃ, ṭhatvā vā uccabhūmiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6126_0: Samāne vāpi ucce vā, nipanne neva vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6140_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, dasame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6143_0: Pañhaṃ pucchati ce thero, kathetuṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6148_0: Gacchato purato pañhaṃ, na vattabbaṃ tu pacchato;
tika-vin10t:6151_0: Saddhiṃ uggahitaṃ dhammaṃ, sajjhāyati hi vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6159_0: Tatiye natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthe harite pana;
tika-vin10t:6162_0: Jīvarukkhassa yaṃ mūlaṃ, dissamānaṃ tu gacchati;
tika-vin10t:6163_0: Sākhā vā bhūmilaggā taṃ, sabbaṃ haritameva hi.
tika-vin10t:6171_0: Kato aharite ṭhāne, haritaṃ eti vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6172_0: Siṅghāṇikā gatā ettha, kheḷeneva ca saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6178_0: Deve pana ca vassante, udakoghe samantato;
tika-vin10t:6219_0: Chandaso methunaṃ dhammaṃ, paṭiseveyya yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6220_0: Hoti pārājikā nāma, samaṇī sā pavuccati.
tika-vin10t:6232_0: Sarīrakena ce tena, phuseyya bhikkhunī pana.
tika-vin10t:6235_0: Sarīramassa tena vā, phuṭṭhā pārājikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:6243_0: Avasesena vā tassa, kāyaṃ kāyena attano;
tika-vin10t:6244_0: Hoti thullaccayaṃ tassā, payoge purisassa ca.
tika-vin10t:6250_0: Avasese ca sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6253_0: Kapparassa ca heṭṭhāpi, gataṃ ettheva saṅgahaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6255_0: Kelāyati sace bhikkhu, saddhiṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6261_0: Bhikkhuno methuno rāgo, gehapemampi vā bhave;
tika-vin10t:6262_0: Tassā thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6264_0: Ubhinnaṃ methune rāge, gehapemepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t:6267_0: Yassa yattha manosuddhaṃ, tassa tattha na dosatā;
tika-vin10t:6271_0: Pacchā dūseti ce neva, hoti bhikkhunidūsako.
tika-vin10t:6274_0: Niccalo hoti ce bhikkhu, na hotāpatti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:6276_0: Bhikkhunī bhikkhunā phuṭṭhā, sace hotipi niccalā;
tika-vin10t:6282_0: Tassā kriyasamuṭṭhānaṃ, evaṃ sati na dissati;
tika-vin10t:6292_0: Pārājikattaṃ jānanti, saliṅge tu ṭhitāya hi;
tika-vin10t:6295_0: Dhure nikkhittamattasmiṃ, sā ca pārājikā siyā;
tika-vin10t:6299_0: Viseso tatra pācitti, idha pārājikaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6303_0: Yaṃdiṭṭhiko ca so tassā, diṭṭhiyā gahaṇena taṃ.
tika-vin10t:6305_0: Anuvatteyya yā bhikkhuṃ, bhikkhunī sā visumpi ca;
tika-vin10t:6308_0: Acajantīva taṃ vatthuṃ, gahetvā yadi tiṭṭhati;
tika-vin10t:6312_0: Puna appaṭisandheyā, dvidhā bhinnā silā viya.
tika-vin10t:6327_0: Sallapeyya tathā tattha, ṭhatvā tu purisena vā;
tika-vin10t:6328_0: Saṅketaṃ vāpi gaccheyya, iccheyyā gamanassa vā.
tika-vin10t:6331_0: Upasaṃhareyya kāyaṃ vā, hatthapāse ṭhitā pana.
tika-vin10t:6336_0: Anulomena vā vatthuṃ, paṭilomena vā cutā;
tika-vin10t:6339_0: Athādito panekaṃ vā, dve vā tīṇipi satta vā;
tika-vin10t:6368_0: Sakkhiṃ vāpi sahāyaṃ vā, pariyesati dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6369_0: Pade pade tathā aṭṭaṃ, kātuṃ gacchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:6371_0: Āroceti sace pubbaṃ, bhikkhunī attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6372_0: Disvā vohārikaṃ tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6374_0: Āroceti sace pacchā, itaro attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6377_0: Ārocetitaro pubbaṃ, sace so attano kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6387_0: Vinicchaye kate tehi, aṭṭe pana ca niṭṭhite.
tika-vin10t:6392_0: Dūtaṃ vāpi pahiṇitvā, āgantvāna sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6395_0: Ārāme pana aññehi, anācāraṃ kataṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:6396_0: Anodissa paraṃ kiñci, rakkhaṃ yācati tattha yā.
tika-vin10t:6398_0: Yāya kiñci avuttāva, dhammaṭṭhā sayameva tu;
tika-vin10t:6399_0: Sutvā taṃ aññato aṭṭaṃ, niṭṭhāpenti sace pana.
tika-vin10t:6405_0: Jānantī bhikkhunī coriṃ, vajjhaṃ viditameva yā;
tika-vin10t:6417_0: Vuṭṭhāpeti ca yā coriṃ, ṭhapetvā kappamevidaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6420_0: Sammannati ca sīmaṃ vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6421_0: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ dvīhi, kammavācāhi ca dvayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6424_0: Gaṇo ācarinī ceva, na ca muccati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6427_0: Kappaṃ vā apaloketvā, tassā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:6434_0: Ohīyeyya gaṇamhā vā, rattiṃ vippavaseyya vā.
tika-vin10t:6439_0: Nikkhamitvā tato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6448_0: Nikkhamitvā sace pacchā, sakaṃ gāmaṃ visantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6449_0: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, vaticchiddena vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:6452_0: Kappiyanti paviṭṭhattā, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:6454_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ vihārassa, bhūmi tāsaṃ tu kappiyā;
tika-vin10t:6460_0: Yaṃ kiñci sakagāmaṃ vā, paragāmampi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:6464_0: Pāraṃ gacchati yā tīraṃ, tassā samaṇiyā pana.
tika-vin10t:6475_0: Nhāyituṃ pivituṃ vāpi, otiṇṇātha nadiṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:6481_0: Setunā upagantvā vā, yānākāsehi vā sace;
tika-vin10t:6482_0: Yāti uttaraṇe kāle, padasā garukaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:6487_0: Piṭṭhiyaṃ vā nisīditvā, khandhe vā uttarantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6497_0: Na doso dutiyā pāsaṃ, uṭṭheti aruṇaṃ sace.
tika-vin10t:6500_0: Gāmato bahi nikkhamma, tassā dutiyikāya tu.
tika-vin10t:6520_0: Dvinnaṃ maggaṃ gacchantīnaṃ, ekā gantuṃ no sakkoti;
tika-vin10t:6524_0: Hoti tassāpi āpatti, saussāhā na hoti ce.
tika-vin10t:6526_0: Gacchantīsu tathā dvīsu, purimā yāti ekakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6527_0: Aññaṃ pana sace maggaṃ, pacchimāpi ca gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:6538_0: Pakkantā vāpi vibbhantā, yātā petānaṃ lokaṃ vā;
tika-vin10t:6539_0: Pakkhasaṅkantā vā naṭṭhā, saddhiṃ yātā sā ce hoti.
tika-vin10t:6545_0: Agāmake araññe tu, gaṇā ohīyanaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6548_0: Cattāropi ca saṅghādi-sesā tassā na vijjare.
tika-vin10t:6555_0: Ñattiyā dukkaṭaṃ, dvīhi, honti thullaccayā duve.
