tika-vin10t:6560_0: Pucchitvā kārakaṃ saṅghaṃ, chandaṃ datvā gaṇassa vā;
tika-vin10t:6561_0: Vatte vā pana vattantiṃ, asante kārakepi vā.
tika-vin10t:6563_0: Bhikkhuniṃ pana ukkhittaṃ, yā osāreti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6585_0: Gahaṇe paribhoge ca, sabbatthāpi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6588_0: “Avassuto na cāya”nti, ñatvā gaṇhati yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6606_0: “Nāvassuto”ti ñatvā vā, kupitā vā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:6607_0: Kulānuddayatā vāpi, uyyojeti ca yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6617_0: Navame dasame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6622_0: Yāvatatiyakā aṭṭha, cattāri ca ito tato.
tika-vin10t:6639_0: Akāle cīvaraṃ dinnaṃ, dinnaṃ kālepi kenaci;
tika-vin10t:6643_0: Bhājāpeyya ca yā tassā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6645_0: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ yaṃ, taṃ tu nissaggiyaṃ bhave;
tika-vin10t:6648_0: Katvā vinayakammaṃ tu, paṭiladdhampi taṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:6649_0: Tassa cāyamadhippāyo, sevituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6662_0: Itaresu ca vatthūnaṃ, payogassa vasā siyā.
tika-vin10t:6667_0: Tāya vā dīyamānaṃ tu, tassā vissāsameva vā;
tika-vin10t:6677_0: Tasmiṃ taññeva vā aññaṃ, aññenatthepi vā sati;
tika-vin10t:6684_0: Aññaṃ cetāpetvā pubbaṃ, pacchā aññaṃ cetāpeyya;
tika-vin10t:6685_0: Evaṃ saññāyaññaṃ dhaññaṃ, mayhaṃ ānetvā detīti.
tika-vin10t:6688_0: Lābhe nissaggiyaṃ hoti, tena caññena vābhataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6697_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ, lābhe, tassā nissaggiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:6707_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:6718_0: Payoge dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, lābhe nissaggiyaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:6732_0: Tato ce uttariṃ yaṃ tu, cetāpeti hi bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6746_0: Gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ tassā, pācitti yadi khādati;
tika-vin10t:6749_0: Dve tayo bhaṇḍike saddhiṃ, saṅkhāditvā sace pana;
tika-vin10t:6750_0: Ajjhoharati yā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6752_0: Bhinditvā tattha ekekaṃ, miñjaṃ khādantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6761_0: Ekā miñjā palaṇḍussa, bhañjanassa duve siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:6774_0: Na doso sati ābādhe, lomake saṃharantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6781_0: Gaṇḍaṃ tattha vaṇaṃ vāpi, na doso paharantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6792_0: Pavesāpeti vā tasmiṃ, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:6804_0: Catunnaṃ vāpi tissannaṃ, ekapabbampi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6817_0: Bhuñjato pana bhikkhussa, pānīyaṃ vā vidhūpanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6827_0: Khādato khādanaṃ vāpi, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6829_0: Na doso deti dāpeti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:6833_0: Viññatvā āmakaṃ dhaññaṃ, bhajjitvā yadi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6834_0: Koṭṭetvā ca pacitvā ca, pācitti paribhuñjati.
tika-vin10t:6836_0: Na kevalaṃ tu dhaññānaṃ, gahaṇeyeva dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6837_0: Haraṇepi ca dhaññānaṃ, tathā sukkhāpane pana.
tika-vin10t:6846_0: Viññatvā vā sayaṃ tasmā, bhajjanādīni aññato.
tika-vin10t:6849_0: Kārāpetvāpi katvā vā, ajjhoharati yā pana.
tika-vin10t:6854_0: Bhajjanādīni katvā vā, kārāpetvāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:6857_0: Viññattiyā panaññāya, laddhaṃ tāya sayampi vā;
tika-vin10t:6864_0: Ñātakānampi dhaññaṃ tu, āmakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:6870_0: Uccāraṃ vāpi passāvaṃ, saṅkāraṃ vā vighāsakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6871_0: Chaḍḍeyya vā tirokuṭṭe, chaḍḍāpeyya parehi vā.
tika-vin10t:6873_0: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, pākārepi ayaṃ nayo;
tika-vin10t:6882_0: Sabbattha pana bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6883_0: Avalañjepi vā ṭhāne, oloketvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:6889_0: Khette vā nāḷikerādi-ārāme vāpi yā pana;
tika-vin10t:6892_0: Tāni cattāri vatthūni, sace chaḍḍeti vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6895_0: Bhuñjamānā nisīditvā, khette tu harite tathā;
tika-vin10t:6896_0: Ucchuādīni khādantī, gacchantī pana tattha yā.
tika-vin10t:6898_0: Chaḍḍeti yadi ucchiṭṭhaṃ, udakaṃ calakāni vā;
tika-vin10t:6899_0: Hoti pācittiyaṃ tassā, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6905_0: Na uṭṭhetaṅkuraṃ yāva, sabbesaṃ tāva dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:6907_0: Lāyitampi manussānaṃ, khettaṃ rakkhati ce puna;
tika-vin10t:6910_0: Na doso chaḍḍite khette, sabbaṃ chaḍḍentiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:6914_0: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:6921_0: Suṇāti tesaṃ gītampi, ekā pācitti dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:6923_0: Aññasmimpi disābhāge, naccaṃ passati ce pana;
tika-vin10t:6924_0: Suṇāti aññato gītaṃ, visuṃ pācittiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:6927_0: Naccituṃ gāyituṃ neva, sayaṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6929_0: “Aññaṃ naccāti vādehi”, iti vattuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:6932_0: Tassā pācitti sabbattha, bhikkhuno hoti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6936_0: Ārāmeyeva ṭhatvā vā, yā passati suṇāti vā.
tika-vin10t:6938_0: Attano ca ṭhitokāsaṃ, āgantvā ca payojitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6939_0: Gantvā passantiyā vāpi, tathārūpā hi kāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:6941_0: Passantiyā tathā maggaṃ, naccaṃ paṭipathepi ca;
tika-vin10t:6950_0: Santiṭṭhati sace saddhiṃ, purisena ca bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:6952_0: Tassā pācittiyaṃ vuttaṃ, saddhiṃ vā sallapantiyā;
tika-vin10t:6955_0: Hatthapāsaṃ jahitvā vā, purisassa sace pana;
tika-vin10t:6958_0: Santiṭṭhati ca yā tassā, dukkaṭaṃ paridīpitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:6959_0: Anāpatti sace koci, dutiyā viññu vijjati.
tika-vin10t:6966_0: Adhikaṃ itaraṃ sabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:6976_0: Atikkameti yā, hoti, dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pade;
tika-vin10t:6977_0: Dutiye ca pade tassā, pācitti pariyāputā.
tika-vin10t:6993_0: Chaṭṭhena sattamaṃ tulyaṃ, aṭṭhame natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7011_0: Dvīsu tesu panekekaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu karontiyā.
tika-vin10t:7027_0: Dutiye pana vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7032_0: Anantarāya taṃ pacchā, yā na sibbeyya bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:7037_0: Pacchā sibbati pācitti, nikkhipitvā dhuraṃ sace;
tika-vin10t:7050_0: Ekasmiṃ cīvare ekā, pañca pañcasu dīpitā;
tika-vin10t:7070_0: Yā hi bhikkhuni saṅghassa, labhitabbaṃ tu cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:7073_0: Gaṇassāpi ca ekissā, lābhe āpatti dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7096_0: Gaṇanāya vasenettha, cīvarānaṃ tu tā pana;
tika-vin10t:7107_0: Ubhosu kaṅkhitāya vā, avoca dukkaṭaṃ jino.
tika-vin10t:7125_0: Sesaṃ pana asesena, sattamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7130_0: Ekāya tu nipannāya, aparā vā nipajjatu;
tika-vin10t:7131_0: Nipajjeyyuṃ saheva dve, dvinnaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7134_0: Ekāya ca nipannāya, sace ekā nisīdati.
tika-vin10t:7136_0: Ubho vāpi nisīdanti, samaṃ, ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7143_0: Nipajjanti saheva dve, tāsaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7144_0: Ekasmiṃ dukkaṭaṃ dvinnaṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7161_0: Na ca aphāsukāmāya, āpucchā purato pana;
tika-vin10t:7179_0: Sayaṃ upassayā tamhā, nikkaḍḍhati sace pana.
tika-vin10t:7182_0: Taṃ nikkaḍḍhantiyā tassā, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7197_0: Chaṭṭhe panidha vattabbaṃ, apubbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7207_0: Na doso saha satthena, khemaṭṭhānāpadāsu vā;
tika-vin10t:7211_0: Aṭṭhame navame vāpi, anuttānaṃ na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:7216_0: Katvā ca dhuranikkhepaṃ, pacchā gacchantiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t:7219_0: Chasu vattabbamevatthi, kinnu nāmidha taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7221_0: Tīṇi gantvā ca teneva, paccāgantuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:7238_0: Niddiṭṭhaṃ muninā tāsaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ tu pade pade;
tika-vin10t:7242_0: Gantvā passanti ce taṃ taṃ, pāṭekkāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:7245_0: Bhikkhussa pana sabbattha, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7251_0: Āsandiṃ vā pallaṅkaṃ vā, māṇanātītaṃ vāḷūpetaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7263_0: Channaṃ aññataraṃ suttaṃ, yadi kantati bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:7264_0: Yattakaṃ añchitaṃ hatthā, tasmiṃ takkamhi veṭhite.
tika-vin10t:7269_0: Na doso kantitaṃ suttaṃ, puna kantantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:7273_0: Koṭṭanaṃ taṇḍulānaṃ tu, ādiṃ katvāna dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7280_0: Kiñci kammaṃ akāretvā, kiñci kātuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7282_0: Saṅghassa yāgupāne vā, saṅghabhattepi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:7285_0: Attano ca anāpatti, tathā ummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7290_0: Tathā idha panekāhaṃ, parihāro na labbhati.
tika-vin10t:7297_0: Gihīnaṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, dantaponodakaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t:7299_0: Ajjhoharaṇiyaṃ aññaṃ, aññesaṃ tu dadāti yā;
tika-vin10t:7303_0: Yā na deti ca dāpeti, nikkhamitvāpi dentiyā.
tika-vin10t:7305_0: Deti bāhiralepaṃ vā, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7310_0: Divase tu catutthe taṃ, dhovitvā puna cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:7315_0: Tassā nissajjite tasmiṃ, vuttaṃ tu dvikadukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7316_0: Utunīnaṃ abhāve tu, aññāsaṃ puna pariyaye.
tika-vin10t:7325_0: Attano gāmato aññaṃ, gāmaṃ gacchantiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:7341_0: Pariyāpuṇeyya ce kiñci, yassa kassaci santike;
tika-vin10t:7344_0: Lekhe pana anāpatti, dhāraṇāya ca guttiyā;
tika-vin10t:7345_0: Parittesu ca sabbesu, tathā ummattikāya vā.
tika-vin10t:7348_0: Dasame natthi vattabbaṃ, navamena samaṃ idaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7360_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā.
tika-vin10t:7363_0: Jātakaṅkhāya vā tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7366_0: Tā sannipatitā yattha, tāsaṃ gacchati santikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7375_0: Akkoseyya ca yā bhikkhuṃ, paribhāseyya vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7384_0: Yā saṅghaṃ paribhāseyya, tassā pācittiyaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7385_0: Ekaṃ sambahulā vāpi, tatheva itarāya vā.
tika-vin10t:7391_0: Nimantitāpi vā sace, pavāritāpi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7395_0: Yā cajjhoharaṇatthāya, yaṃ kiñci pana āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7397_0: Paṭiggaṇhāti ce tassā, gahaṇe dukkaṭaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:7408_0: Kālikāni ca tīṇeva, paccaye sati bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:7412_0: Nimantitā anāpucchā, sāmiṃ bhuñjati ce pana.
tika-vin10t:7414_0: Kappiyaṃ pana kāretvā, akāretvāpi vā yadi;
tika-vin10t:7415_0: Paribhuñjati yā tassā, pācitti kriyato siyā.
tika-vin10t:7421_0: Santaṃ bhāsantiyā dosaṃ, na dosummattikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:7426_0: Na vasati sace maggo, akhemo vā sace siyā.
tika-vin10t:7428_0: Ayaṃ abhikkhuko nāma, āvāso pana tattha hi;
tika-vin10t:7431_0: Pakkantā pakkhasaṅkantā, vibbhantā vā matāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:7446_0: Pariyesitvāpi vā bhikkhuṃ, na doso alabhantiyā;
tika-vin10t:7458_0: Iccevaṃ pana nikkhitte, dhure pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7467_0: Pasākhe pana sañjātaṃ, gaṇḍaṃ rucitameva vā;
tika-vin10t:7468_0: Anāpucchāva saṅghaṃ vā, gaṇaṃ ekena ekikā.
tika-vin10t:7471_0: Katesu dukkaṭāniccha, tassā pācittiyo cha ca.
tika-vin10t:7473_0: “Yamettha atthi kātabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ tvaṃ karohi”ti;
tika-vin10t:7474_0: Āṇāpeti sace evaṃ, so ca sabbaṃ karoti ce.
tika-vin10t:7476_0: Ekāya pana vācāya, dukkaṭāni panaccha ca;
tika-vin10t:7479_0: Bhedanādīsu ekaṃ sā, āṇāpeti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:7480_0: So karoti ca sabbāni, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7482_0: Āpucchitvāpi vā viññuṃ, gahetvā dutiyampi vā;
tika-vin10t:7494_0: Tathā gabbhinisaññāya, na ca gabbhiniyā pana.
tika-vin10t:7503_0: Dutiye natthi vattabbaṃ, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7508_0: Dve vassāni siyāpatti, vuṭṭhāpeyya sace pana.
tika-vin10t:7513_0: Chasu sikkhitasikkhaṃ yā, dve vassāni akhaṇḍato;
tika-vin10t:7516_0: Imā hi cha ca sikkhāyo, saṭṭhivassāpi ce pana;
tika-vin10t:7517_0: Pabbajjāya padātabbā, adatvā na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:7520_0: Catutthe natthi vattabbaṃ, idha saṅghena sammataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7527_0: Paṭhamena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, catutthaṃ tu kriyākriyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7534_0: Asesena ca sesaṃ tu, paṭhamena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:7538_0: Sattamampi tathā sabbaṃ, catutthena samaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:7542_0: Vuttaṃ tena samaṃ ñeyyaṃ, aṭṭhamaṃ na visesatā.
tika-vin10t:7545_0: Dve vassāni ca yā kāci, vuṭṭhāpitapavattiniṃ;
tika-vin10t:7558_0: Vuṭṭhāpetvā tu yā kāci, bhikkhunī sahajīviniṃ;
tika-vin10t:7559_0: Taṃ gahetvā na gaccheyya, na caññaṃ āṇāpeyya ce.
tika-vin10t:7572_0: Yā mahūpapadā dve tu, sikkhamānā panādito;
tika-vin10t:7575_0: Sace gihigatā honti, na ca vā purisaṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:7579_0: Vattabbā panubhopetā, evaṃ vattuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7584_0: Yā aṭṭhārasavassā tu, tato paṭṭhāya sā pana;
tika-vin10t:7601_0: Pañcame natthi vattabbaṃ, catutthaṃ pañcamampi ca;
tika-vin10t:7612_0: Laddhe ca cīvare pacchā, asante antarāyike;
tika-vin10t:7629_0: Mātarā pitarā vātha, nānuññātaṃ tu sāminā;
tika-vin10t:7633_0: Dvikkhattuṃ pucchitabbaṃ tu, bhikkhunīhi, na bhikkhunā.
tika-vin10t:7649_0: Dvādase terase vāpi, vattabbaṃ natthi kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:7658_0: Divasampi ca dhāreti, ekaṃ pācittiyaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:7661_0: Chattameva ca dhārentī, yadi gacchati dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7667_0: Puna dhārentiyā tassā, hoti pācittiyaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:7683_0: Yā ca dhāreyya saṅghāṇiṃ, yaṃ kiñcipi kaṭūpiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7696_0: Dhāreti pana yaṃ kiñci, sace sīsūpagādisu;
tika-vin10t:7697_0: Tassā tassa ca vatthussa, gaṇanāpattiyo siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:7699_0: Ābādhapaccayā doso, kiñci dhārentiyā na ca;
tika-vin10t:7709_0: Sesaṃ tu tatiyeneva, sadisaṃ sabbathā mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7732_0: Idaṃ pana samuṭṭhānaṃ, kathinena samaṃ mataṃ;
tika-vin10t:7737_0: Vinaye ca katokāsaṃ, suttaṃ pucchantiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:7746_0: Dukkaṭaṃ paṭhame pāde, pācitti dutiye siyā;
tika-vin10t:7749_0: Yassā saṃkaccikaṃ naṭṭhaṃ, acchinnaṃ vāpi kenaci;
tika-vin10t:7759_0: Agilānā sace sappiṃ, laddhaṃ viññattiyā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7776_0: Bhuñjantiyā tu viññatvā, aṭṭhasupi ca dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:7780_0: Sekhiyā pana ye dhammā, uddiṭṭhā pañcasattati;
tika-vin10t:7794_0: Suṇanti vinaye hi te ye hite;
tika-vin10t:7824_0: Pabbājeti sace taṃ so, sayamevāpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7826_0: Sāmaṇeropi vattabbo, daharo natthi tattha ce;
tika-vin10t:7832_0: Purisaṃ bhikkhuto añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:7833_0: Itthiṃ bhikkhunito añño, pabbājeti na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7835_0: Sāmaṇeropi vā dātuṃ, sāmaṇerīpi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:7838_0: Sayameva ca yaṃ kiñci, pabbājentena bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:7842_0: Sarīre pīḷakā vāpi, kacchu vā tassa honti ce.
tika-vin10t:7844_0: Mātā yathā niyaṃputtaṃ, na jigucchati sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:7859_0: Atha hatthepi vā tassa, adatvā sayameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:7862_0: Nivāseti anāṇatto, so pārupati vā sayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:7863_0: Apanetvā tato sabbaṃ, puna dātabbameva taṃ.
tika-vin10t:7865_0: Bhikkhunā tu sahatthena, tathā āṇattiyāpi vā;
tika-vin10t:7866_0: Dinnaṃ vaṭṭati kāsāvaṃ, nādinnaṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7868_0: Tasseva santakaṃ vāpi, kā kathā attasantake;
tika-vin10t:7874_0: Sace ekapadaṃ vāpi, deti ekakkharampi vā;
tika-vin10t:7875_0: Paṭipāṭiṃ virajjhitvā, gahitaṃ ce na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:7877_0: Tikkhattuṃ yadi vā deti, buddhaṃ saraṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t:7878_0: Tathā sesesu cevampi, na dinnāneva honti hi.
tika-vin10t:7884_0: Na hoti pana pabbajjā, ubhatosuddhiyā vinā.
tika-vin10t:7900_0: Dātabbaṃ tassa kālena, sace yāgu bhavissati.
tika-vin10t:7905_0: Cīvare yāni vattāni, vuttāni hi mahesinā;
tika-vin10t:7926_0: Ekekassa ubhinnaṃ vā, nālaye sati bhijjati.
tika-vin10t:7932_0: Yācitassa na dosova, vasituṃ nissayaṃ vinā.
tika-vin10t:7963_0: Tathā kaṇṇikakeso vā, thūlakesopi vā tathā.
tika-vin10t:7977_0: Tathā ṭaṅkitakaṇṇo vā, pūtikaṇṇopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:7986_0: Niccavissavanāso vā, yo vā pana mahāmukho;
tika-vin10t:7999_0: Sukhumova ṭhito, taṃ ce, pabbājetumpi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8016_0: Vikaṭo vāpi paṇho vā, tathā ubbaddhapiṇḍiko.
tika-vin10t:8019_0: Tathā piṭṭhikapādo vā, mahāpaṇhipi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8021_0: Vaṅkapādo naro yo vā, gaṇṭhikaṅgulikopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8028_0: “Sāmaṇerajja mā khāda, mā bhuñja ca pivā”ti ca;
tika-vin10t:8037_0: Yāguṃ vā pana bhattaṃ vā, dassetvā kira bhāsituṃ;
tika-vin10t:8046_0: Udakaṃ vā pavesetuṃ, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8056_0: Vāritā yassa pabbajjā, nāsetabboti so mato;
tika-vin10t:8057_0: Tividhe pana te ñatvā, pabbājentassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8063_0: Sayameva ca yo tattha, pabbajitvā na gaṇhati;
tika-vin10t:8067_0: Yo ca pabbajito hutvā, bhikkhuvassāni gaṇhati.
tika-vin10t:8076_0: Theyyasaṃvāsako nāma, tāva esa na vuccati”.
tika-vin10t:8083_0: Hoti titthiyapakkanto, liṅge tesaṃ tu nissite.
tika-vin10t:8091_0: Morapiñchādikaṃ tesaṃ, liṅgaṃ gaṇhāti vā sace;
tika-vin10t:8092_0: Sārato ceva vā tesaṃ, pabbajjaṃ laddhimeva vā.
tika-vin10t:8101_0: Nāgo vāpi supaṇṇo vā, yakkho sakkopi vā idha;
tika-vin10t:8109_0: Dūsetvā pana so neva, bhikkhunīdūsako siyā.
tika-vin10t:8112_0: Labhateva ca pabbajjaṃ, sā ca neva parājitā.
tika-vin10t:8116_0: Karoto dukkaṭaṃ hoti, na kuppati sace kataṃ.
tika-vin10t:8119_0: Sesesupi ayaṃ ñeyyo, nayo sabbattha viññunā.
tika-vin10t:8125_0: Apatto tesamosāro, kato ce pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t:8133_0: Osāretvā kataṃ kammaṃ, na ca kuppati kappati.
tika-vin10t:8140_0: Anupubbena sāvetvā, tesaṃ nāmaṃ tu tena ca;
tika-vin10t:8141_0: Ekato anusāvetvā, katampi ca na kuppati.
tika-vin10t:8155_0: Nimittena nimittaṃ tu, ghaṭetvā pana sammatā.
tika-vin10t:8158_0: Baddhā nāma siyā sīmā, sā tisampattisaṃyutā.
tika-vin10t:8161_0: Iti baddhā tidhā vuttā, abaddhāpi tidhā matā.
tika-vin10t:8166_0: Jātassare samudde vā, nadiyā vā samantato;
tika-vin10t:8175_0: Imā dve pana sīmāyo, vaḍḍhanti parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t:8182_0: Tasmā so hatthapāse vā, kātabbo bahi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8185_0: Ñatvā pamāṇaṃ sodhetvā, sīmaṃ bandheyya paṇḍito.
tika-vin10t:8190_0: Pabbataṃ vanaṃ pāsāṇaṃ, rukkhaṃ maggañca vammikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8193_0: Tesu tīṇi nimittāni, ādiṃ katvā samantato;
tika-vin10t:8224_0: Saṅghassa pātimokkho ca, pārisuddhi gaṇassa ca;
tika-vin10t:8230_0: Ayameva nayo ñeyyo, sesesupi ca viññunā;
tika-vin10t:8241_0: Uddisante samappā vā, āgacchanti sace pana;
tika-vin10t:8242_0: Uddiṭṭhaṃ taṃ suuddiṭṭhaṃ, sāvetabbaṃ tu sesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8245_0: Pārisuddhi tu kattabbā, mūle tesaṃ, sace bahū.
tika-vin10t:8254_0: No ce adhiṭṭhaheyyassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8257_0: Tathā dhammena vaggena, samaggena ca dhammato.
tika-vin10t:8265_0: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t:8271_0: Dhammena pana vaggo hi, katamo so uposatho;
tika-vin10t:8274_0: Ekassa pārisuddhiṃ te, ānayitvā tayo janā;
tika-vin10t:8282_0: Vagge samagge vaggoti, saññino vimatissa vā;
tika-vin10t:8295_0: Uposatho na kātabbo, dine vā anuposathe.
tika-vin10t:8298_0: Āvāso vā anāvāso, na gantabbo kudācanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8318_0: Dasavaggena abbhānaṃ, vinā sabbaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8320_0: Kammaṃ vīsativaggena, na kattabbaṃ na kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:8324_0: Catuvaggena kattabbe, sesesu ca ayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:8330_0: Katvā pana karontānaṃ, tathā, sesaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8341_0: Ajjhokāsepi vā vassaṃ, upagantuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8352_0: Diṭṭhiṃ vā tassa kukkuccaṃ, vinodessāmahanti vā.
tika-vin10t:8358_0: Dhammassa savanatthāya, gantuṃ pana na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8361_0: Iccevaṃ katikā pubbaṃ, katā ce pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8376_0: Sace pāpuṇituṃ gacchaṃ, na sakkoteva vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8378_0: Vaje satthepi nāvāyaṃ, tīsu ṭhānesu bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8384_0: Yena kenantarāyena, vassaṃ nopagato hi yo;
tika-vin10t:8387_0: Vassaṃ anupagantvā vā, tadaheva ca gacchati;
tika-vin10t:8388_0: Bahiddhā eva sattāhaṃ, upagantvāpi vā pana.
tika-vin10t:8390_0: Vītināmeti ce tassa, purimāpi na vijjati;
tika-vin10t:8391_0: Paṭissave ca bhikkhussa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8393_0: Vassaṃ panupagantvā ca, uṭṭhāpetvā na cāruṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8396_0: Antoyeva ca sattāhaṃ, nivattantassa tassa tu;
tika-vin10t:8397_0: Anāpattīti ko vādo, vasitvā bahi gacchato.
tika-vin10t:8402_0: Gahitaṃ suggahitaṃ hoti, chinnavasso na hoti so;
tika-vin10t:8403_0: Labhateva pavāretuṃ, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:8406_0: Nicchārite ca tikkhattuṃ, vassaṃ upagato siyā.
tika-vin10t:8408_0: Ādiṃ tu navamiṃ katvā, gantuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8409_0: Āgacchatu ca pacchā so, mā vā doso na vijjati.
tika-vin10t:8414_0: Tevācī dvekavācī ca, saṅghe ca gaṇapuggale.
tika-vin10t:8416_0: Etā pana munindena, vuttā nava pavāraṇā;
tika-vin10t:8420_0: Ñattiṃ ṭhapetvā saṅghena, kattabbā hi pavāraṇā.
tika-vin10t:8423_0: Sayaṃ yāva pavāreyya, tāva ukkuṭikañhi so.
tika-vin10t:8425_0: Ñattiṃ vatvā pavāreyyuṃ, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8428_0: Aññamaññaṃ pavāreyyuṃ, vinā ñattiṃ duve janā;
tika-vin10t:8434_0: Pañca yasmiṃ panāvāse, cattāro vā tayopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8449_0: Chandaṃ vā pārisuddhiṃ vā, gahetvā vā pavāraṇaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8452_0: Sace so saṅghamappatvā, vibbhameyya mareyya vā;
tika-vin10t:8453_0: Nāhaṭañceva taṃ sabbaṃ, patvā cevaṃ siyāhaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8455_0: Saṅghaṃ patvā pamatto vā, sutto vā khittacittako;
tika-vin10t:8479_0: Na ca vaṭṭanti morassa, piñchena parisibbitā.
tika-vin10t:8482_0: Ajinassa ca cammena, na vaṭṭati parikkhaṭā.
tika-vin10t:8484_0: Puṭādiṃ apanetvā vā, chinditvā vāpi sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:8487_0: Sabbāpi pana dhāretuṃ, na ca vaṭṭanti pādukā;
tika-vin10t:8493_0: Gonakaṃ kuttakaṃ cittaṃ, paṭikaṃ paṭalikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8502_0: Heṭṭhā akappiye paccatthare sati na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:8505_0: Āsandiṃ pana pallaṅkaṃ, ṭhapetvā tūlikampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8506_0: Sesaṃ pana ca sabbampi, labhate gihisantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8516_0: Saṅghassa santakaṃ gehaṃ, santakaṃ bhikkhunopi vā;
tika-vin10t:8522_0: Sā hi sammutikā nāma, yā hi saṅghena sammatā;
tika-vin10t:8538_0: Ettha pakkañca vutthañca, sabbaṃ vaṭṭati āmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8546_0: Bhikkhuṃ ṭhapetvā aññesaṃ, hatthato ca paṭiggaho;
tika-vin10t:8547_0: Tesañca sannidhi anto- vuttaṃ bhikkhussa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8549_0: Bhikkhussa bhikkhuniyā vā, santakaṃ saṅghikampi vā;
tika-vin10t:8550_0: Antovutthañca pakkañca, ubhinnaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8556_0: Pakkaṃ taṃ pana sattāhaṃ, vaṭṭateva nirāmisaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8568_0: Honti dosakarā bhuttā, abhuttaṃ tatiyampi ca.
tika-vin10t:8570_0: Ambaṃ jambu ca cocañca, mocañca madhu muddikā;
tika-vin10t:8577_0: Pacchā parissavaṃ katvā, pātuṃ vaṭṭati pānakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8585_0: Sabbo puppharaso vutto, madhukassa rasaṃ vinā;
tika-vin10t:8629_0: Kathinassa ca kiṃ mūlaṃ, kiṃ vatthu kā ca bhūmiyo;
tika-vin10t:8632_0: Mūlamekaṃ, siyā vatthu, tividhaṃ, bhūmiyo cha ca;
tika-vin10t:8635_0: Saṅgho mūlanti niddiṭṭhaṃ, vatthu hoti ticīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:8636_0: Khomādīni cha vuttāni, cīvarāni cha bhūmiyo.
tika-vin10t:8641_0: Dhovanañca vicāro ca, chedanaṃ bandhanampi ca;
tika-vin10t:8648_0: Savanāsā ca sīmā ca, sahubbhāroti aṭṭhimā.
tika-vin10t:8654_0: Gantvā pana vihāraṃ so, aññaṃ sukhavihārikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8656_0: Tattha taṃ viharantova, karoti yadi cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:8663_0: Karontasseva naṭṭhaṃ vā, daḍḍhaṃ vā nāsanantikā.
tika-vin10t:8671_0: Puna vutte “na sakkomi, dātunti tava cīvaraṃ”;
tika-vin10t:8687_0: Tayopi kathinubbhārā, na tu saṅghā, na bhikkhuto.
tika-vin10t:8696_0: Tattha yo cīvaruppādo, ānisaṃsā ca pañcime.
tika-vin10t:8706_0: Tattha sīmāya detīti, antosīmaṃ gatehi tu;
tika-vin10t:8709_0: Katikāya ca dinnaṃ ye, vihārā ekalābhakā;
tika-vin10t:8712_0: Saṅghassa dhuvakārā hi, yattha karīyanti tattha ca;
tika-vin10t:8715_0: Saṅghassa pana yaṃ dinnaṃ, ujubhūtena cetasā;
tika-vin10t:8719_0: Thokā vā bahu vā bhikkhū, samabhāgova vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8721_0: Vassaṃvuṭṭhassa saṅghassa, cīvaraṃ deti yaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:8724_0: Yāguyā pana bhatte vā, detiādissa ce pana;
tika-vin10t:8727_0: Puggalaṃ pana uddissa, cīvaraṃ yaṃ tu dīyati;
tika-vin10t:8728_0: Puggalodissakaṃ nāma, dānaṃ taṃ tu pavuccati.
tika-vin10t:8731_0: Ayaṃ mayhaṃ parikkhāro, mātuyā pitunopi vā.
tika-vin10t:8734_0: Na hoti pana taṃ tesaṃ, saṅghasseva ca santakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8736_0: Pañcannaṃ accaye dānaṃ, na ca rūhati kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:8737_0: Saṅghasseva ca taṃ hoti, gihīnaṃ pana rūhati.
tika-vin10t:8739_0: Bhikkhu vā sāmaṇero vā, kālaṃ bhikkhunupassaye;
tika-vin10t:8742_0: Bhikkhunī sāmaṇerī vā, vihārasmiṃ sace matā;
tika-vin10t:8743_0: Honti tassā parikkhārā, bhikkhunīnaṃ tu santakā.
tika-vin10t:8748_0: Evaṃ dinnavidhiṃ ñatvā, matassa vāmatassa vā;
tika-vin10t:8755_0: Pattesu alliyā pattaṃ, tathā pattañca nīliyā.
tika-vin10t:8757_0: Kusumbhaṃ kiṃsukaṃ pupphe, tace loddañca kaṇḍulaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8758_0: Ṭhapetvā rajanaṃ sabbaṃ, phalaṃ sabbampi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8761_0: Alliyā pana pattena, dhovituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8763_0: Cīvarānaṃ kathā sesā, paṭhame kathine pana;
tika-vin10t:8780_0: Ratticchedo kathaṃ vutto, vattabhedo kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t:8804_0: Oṇojanaṃ tathā bhattaṃ, labhate pañcime pana.
tika-vin10t:8811_0: Etāni pana cattāri, vuttāni ca mahesinā;
tika-vin10t:8818_0: Etesaṃ tu catunnampi, samattā samathā matā.
tika-vin10t:8826_0: Vivādo sammati dvīhi, anuvādo catūhi ca;
tika-vin10t:8844_0: Lajjī alajjī bāloti, kena sakkā vijānituṃ?
tika-vin10t:8850_0: Nāpajjati ca sañcicca, āpattiṃ na ca gūhati;
tika-vin10t:8859_0: Alajjī sānuvādo ca, asucī kammato ca yo;
tika-vin10t:8868_0: Yathā ca tiṇapaṇṇena, channaṃ gūthañca muttakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8869_0: Na ca vāyati duggandhaṃ, vūpasammati taṅkhaṇe.
tika-vin10t:8872_0: Diṭṭhāvikammikañceva, yo ca tattha na hoti taṃ.
tika-vin10t:8879_0: Rukkhe vā pana kuṭṭevā, aṭṭāne thambhakesu vā;
tika-vin10t:8886_0: Kataṃ taṃ mallakaṃ nāma, sabbesampi na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8892_0: Vaṭṭaṃ vā caturassaṃ vā, katakaṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8897_0: Osaṇheyya sake kese, yo hatthaphaṇakena vā;
tika-vin10t:8906_0: Ādāse udapatte vā, yattha katthaci attano;
tika-vin10t:8912_0: Naccaṃ vā pana gītaṃ vā, vāditaṃ vāpi bhikkhuno;
tika-vin10t:8913_0: Daṭṭhuṃ vā pana sotuṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8921_0: “Passissāmī”ti naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā pana vāditaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8922_0: Vihārato vihāraṃ vā, gacchato hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8925_0: Ṭhatvā gīvaṃ pasāretvā, passatopi ca vīthiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8927_0: Kesā dīghā na dhāreyyā, yo dhāreyyassa dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8928_0: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, tato uddhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:8930_0: Nakhe nāsikalomāni, dīghāni na tu dhāraye;
tika-vin10t:8931_0: Na ca vīsatimaṭṭhaṃ vā, kātuṃ vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:8933_0: Kappāpeyya visuṃ massuṃ, dāṭhikaṃ vā ṭhapeyya yo;
tika-vin10t:8934_0: Saṃharāpeyya vā lomaṃ, sambādhe tassa dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8936_0: Chindato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, kese kattarikāya vā;
tika-vin10t:8943_0: Na doso chindato aṅgaṃ, mocentassa ca lohitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8948_0: Na bhuñje na pive naggo, na khāde na ca sāyaye;
tika-vin10t:8949_0: Na dade na ca gaṇheyya, na gaccheyyapi añjasaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8952_0: Parikammaṃ na kātabbaṃ, na naggena ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:8957_0: Yattha katthaci peḷāyaṃ, bhuñjituṃ na ca vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:8961_0: Ekamañcepi vā tesaṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:8964_0: Kiñci kīḷaṃ na kīḷeyya, palitaṃ na ca gāhaye.
tika-vin10t:8969_0: Agilāno sace bhikkhu, chattaṃ dhāreyya dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:8978_0: Lokāyataṃ na vāceyya, na ca taṃ pariyāpuṇe;
tika-vin10t:8981_0: Na ca vaṭṭati dhāretuṃ, sabbā cāmaribījanī;
tika-vin10t:8982_0: Na cālimpeyya dāyaṃ vā, na ca lañje mukhampi ca.
tika-vin10t:8993_0: Lasuṇaṃ na ca khādeyya, sace nākallako siyā;
tika-vin10t:9003_0: Na ca dhāraṇiyā uṇhī, sabbā bāhiralomikā.
tika-vin10t:9023_0: Dīghato ca diyaḍḍhaṃ vā, dvihatthanti kurundiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9032_0: Suddhaṃ tamālapattañca, paṇṇesu na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9039_0: Yadetaṃ tividhaṃ tūlaṃ, bhisiyaṃ taṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9040_0: Missaṃ tamālapattaṃ tu, sabbattha pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9043_0: Kārentassa karoto vā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9045_0: Jātakaṃ pana vatthuṃ vā, kārāpetuṃ parehi vā;
tika-vin10t:9048_0: Samānāsaniko nāma, dvīhi vassehi yo pana;
tika-vin10t:9049_0: Vuḍḍho vā daharo vāpi, vassenekena vā pana.
tika-vin10t:9054_0: Heṭṭhā dīghāsanaṃ tiṇṇaṃ, yaṃ pahoti nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t:9055_0: Ekamañcepi pīṭhe vā, dve nisīdanti vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9068_0: Pātova gāhite añño, bhikkhu senāsane pana;
tika-vin10t:9069_0: Sace yācati āgantvā, vattabbo gāhitanti so.
tika-vin10t:9075_0: Gahetvā kappiyaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, datvā tassattano pana.
tika-vin10t:9078_0: Gāhitaṃ gaṇha”iccevaṃ, vatvā gacchati so disaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9080_0: Uppabbajati ce tattha, gataṭṭhāne, na labbhati;
tika-vin10t:9081_0: Gahetuṃ tassa sampattaṃ, saṅghikaṃyeva taṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:9083_0: Manusse sammukhā tattha, paṭicchāpeti ce pana;
tika-vin10t:9086_0: Ārāmo ca vihāro ca, vatthūni duvidhassapi;
tika-vin10t:9090_0: Vāsi pharasu kuddālo, kuṭhārī ca nikhādanaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9092_0: Valli veḷu tiṇaṃ paṇṇaṃ, muñjapabbajameva ca;
tika-vin10t:9093_0: Mattikā dārubhaṇḍañca, pañcamaṃ tu yathāha ca.
tika-vin10t:9104_0: Bhikkhunā garubhaṇḍaṃ tu, saṅghena hi gaṇena vā;
tika-vin10t:9121_0: Attanā paṭiladdhaṃ taṃ, lohabhaṇḍaṃ tu kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9128_0: Na doso saṅghike atthi, gihīnaṃ santakesu vā.
tika-vin10t:9146_0: Kiñci saṅghassa dinnaṃ ce, taṃ sabbaṃ garubhaṇḍakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9148_0: Nhāpitassa ca saṇḍāso, kattarī ca mahattarī;
tika-vin10t:9151_0: Valli saṅghassa dinnā vā, tatthajātāpi rakkhitā;
tika-vin10t:9157_0: Nāḷikerassa hīre vā, vāke vā pana kenaci;
tika-vin10t:9160_0: Veḷu saṅghassa dinno vā, rakkhito tatthajātako;
tika-vin10t:9166_0: Muñjādīsupi yaṃ kiñci, muṭṭhimattaṃ garuṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:9170_0: Mattikā pakatī vāpi, pañcavaṇṇā sudhāpi vā.
tika-vin10t:9172_0: Silesādīsu vā kiñci, dinnaṃ vā tatthajātakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9178_0: Rakkhitaṃ gopitaṃ vāpi, gahetabbaṃ tu gaṇhatā;
tika-vin10t:9179_0: Samakaṃ atirekaṃ vā, datvā phātikameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9206_0: Bījanī pacchi caṅkoṭaṃ, sabbā sammuñjanī garu.
tika-vin10t:9208_0: Yaṃ kiñci bhūmattharaṇaṃ, yo koci kaṭasārako;
tika-vin10t:9226_0: Patto kañcanako ceva, thālakaṃ kuṇḍikāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:9248_0: Patto avassikaṃ bhikkhuṃ, likhitvā ṭhapitopi ca.
tika-vin10t:9254_0: Gahetuṃ labhati taṃ pacchā, sāmaṇerassa pāḷiyā.
tika-vin10t:9257_0: Ajja so upasampanno, atītā ṭhitikā siyā.
tika-vin10t:9259_0: Sace pana salākā tu, laddhā bhattaṃ na taṃdine;
tika-vin10t:9260_0: Laddhaṃ, punadine tassa, gāhetabbaṃ, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:9263_0: Visuñhi ṭhitikā katvā, dātabbā tu salākikā.
tika-vin10t:9266_0: Laddhamuttaribhaṅgaṃ vā, na laddhaṃ bhattameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9268_0: Yena yena hi yaṃ yaṃ tu, na laddhaṃ, tassa tassa ca;
tika-vin10t:9269_0: Taṃ taṃ punadine cāpi, gāhetabbanti dīpitaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9295_0: Oguṇṭhanaṃ na kātabbaṃ, sīse cīvarameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9296_0: Na hi tena ca dhotabbā, pādā pānīyavārinā.
tika-vin10t:9322_0: Iccevaṃ pana vattabbaṃ, deyyaṃ senāsanampi ca.
tika-vin10t:9330_0: Sahasā pavise nāpi, sahasā na ca nikkhame;
tika-vin10t:9340_0: Nakkhattaṃ tena yogo ca, jānitabbā disāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:9345_0: Sahasā ubbhajitvā vā, na ca vaccakuṭiṃ vise;
tika-vin10t:9346_0: Ukkāsitvā bahi ṭhatvā, pavise saṇikaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:9348_0: Vaccaṃ na nitthunantena, kātabbaṃ pana bhikkhunā;
tika-vin10t:9349_0: Khādato dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9351_0: Vaccaṃ pana na kātabbaṃ, bahiddhā vaccadoṇiyā;
tika-vin10t:9355_0: Chaḍḍeyya na ca pāteyya, kheḷaṃ passāvadoṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:9360_0: Nācameyya sace vaccaṃ, katvā yo salile sati;
tika-vin10t:9363_0: Sasaddaṃ nācametabbaṃ, katvā capu capūti ca;
tika-vin10t:9370_0: Chaḍḍeyya kumbhi rittā ce, kumbhiṃ pūreyya vārinā.
tika-vin10t:9372_0: Anajjhiṭṭho hi vuḍḍhena, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t:9373_0: Dhammaṃ na ca bhaṇe, pañhaṃ, na puccheyya na vissaje.
tika-vin10t:9379_0: Anāpucchā hi sajjhāyo, na kātabbo kadācipi.
tika-vin10t:9381_0: Uddesopi na kātabbo, paripucchāya kā kathā;
tika-vin10t:9382_0: Na ca dhammo kathetabbo, bhikkhunā dhammacakkhunā.
tika-vin10t:9384_0: Na dīpo vijjhāpetabbo, kātabbo vā na ceva so;
tika-vin10t:9388_0: Tampi cīvarakaṇṇena, kāyena na ca ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t:9390_0: Purato neva therānaṃ, nhāyeyya na panūpari;
tika-vin10t:9391_0: Uttaraṃ otarantānaṃ, dade maggaṃ, na ghaṭṭaye.
tika-vin10t:9399_0: Tasmā hi vattaṃ pūreyya, jinaputto vicakkhaṇo;
tika-vin10t:9404_0: Kāyaṃ ūruṃ thanaṃ vāpi, vivaritvāna bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:9405_0: Attano aṅgajātaṃ vā, bhikkhussa na ca dassaye.
tika-vin10t:9407_0: Bhikkhunā saha yaṃ kiñci, sampayojentiyāpi ca;
tika-vin10t:9408_0: Tato bhāsantiyā bhikkhuṃ, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9410_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyā dīghaṃ, dhāreyya kāyabandhanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9413_0: Vilīvena ca paṭṭena, cammapaṭṭena vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:9416_0: Na phāsukā nametabbā, dukkaṭaṃ tu namentiyā;
tika-vin10t:9419_0: Hatthaṃ vā hatthakocchaṃ vā, pādaṃ vā mukhamūrukaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9420_0: Koṭṭāpeti sace tassā, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9422_0: Na mukhaṃ limpitabbaṃ tu, na cuṇṇetabbameva ca;
tika-vin10t:9425_0: Aṅgarāgo na kātabbo, mukharāgopi vā tathā;
tika-vin10t:9426_0: Avaṅgaṃ na ca kātabbaṃ, na kātabbaṃ visesakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9429_0: Ṭhātabbaṃ na ca sāloke, sanaccaṃ na ca kāraye.
tika-vin10t:9432_0: Suraṃ vā pana maṃsaṃ vā, paṇṇaṃ vā vikkiṇantiyā.
tika-vin10t:9434_0: Vaḍḍhiṃ vāpi vaṇijjaṃ vā, payojetuṃ na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9435_0: Tirīṭaṃ kañcukaṃ vāpi, yadi dhāreti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9437_0: Dāso vā pana dāsī vā, tathā kammakaropi vā;
tika-vin10t:9440_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyā sabba-nīlādiṃ pana cīvaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:9441_0: Dhāretabbaṃ, na dhāreyya, sabbaṃ namatakampi ca.
tika-vin10t:9446_0: Dūratova ca passitvā, bhikkhuṃ bhikkhuniyā pana;
tika-vin10t:9449_0: Bhikkhuṃ pana ca passitvā, pattaṃ bhikkhaṃ carantiyā;
tika-vin10t:9461_0: Yassā pabbajjakāle tu, gabbho vuṭṭhāti itthiyā;
tika-vin10t:9462_0: Putto yadi ca tassāpi, dātabbā dutiyā tathā.
tika-vin10t:9465_0: Maṇḍetumpi ure katvā, setuṃ labhati sā pana.
tika-vin10t:9467_0: Ṭhapetvā sahaseyyaṃ tu, tasmiṃ dutiyikāya hi;
tika-vin10t:9470_0: Vibbhameneva sā hoti, yasmā idha abhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:9479_0: Na vaccakuṭiyā vacco, kātabbo yāya kāyaci;
tika-vin10t:9482_0: Na ca vaṭṭati sabbattha, pallaṅkena nisīdituṃ;
tika-vin10t:9485_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyāraññe, vatthabbaṃ tu kathañcana;
tika-vin10t:9486_0: Atitthe naratitthe vā, nhāyituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9489_0: Nhāyeyya paṭisote vā, tassā āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9492_0: Dinnaṃ abhutvā aññassa, dentiyā pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9516_0: Cīvarādiparikkhāraṃ, saṅgho yaṃ deti tassa hi.
tika-vin10t:9519_0: Evaṃ saṅghassa dānaṃ tu, hoti taṃ kammalakkhaṇaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9522_0: Sammuti ceva dānañca, paṭiggāho ca sattamo.
tika-vin10t:9528_0: Tassa nissāraṇā vuttā, yā sā nissāraṇāti hi.
tika-vin10t:9554_0: Sammuti nāma sīmādi, sā pañcadasadhā matā;
tika-vin10t:9579_0: Imesaṃ tu vasā ñeyyā, dasekā samanubhāsanā.
tika-vin10t:9590_0: Sesāni apaloketvā, kātuṃ pana na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9611_0: Na parāmasati vatthuñca, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9613_0: Na parāmasati ñattiṃ vā, pacchā ñattiṃ ṭhapeti vā;
tika-vin10t:9617_0: Na parāmasati vatthuṃ vā, saṅghaṃ puggalameva vā.
tika-vin10t:9623_0: Vuttā uposathe tāva, khandhake sabbaso mayā.
tika-vin10t:9626_0: Chando ca na panānīto, paṭikkosanti sammukhā.
tika-vin10t:9628_0: Evaṃ tivaṅgiko doso, parisāya vasā siyā;
tika-vin10t:9629_0: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chando ca na panāgato.
tika-vin10t:9632_0: Āgatā kammapattā ca, chandopi ca samāhaṭo.
tika-vin10t:9637_0: Catutthikā siyuṃ dosā, dasa dve parisāvasā;
tika-vin10t:9638_0: Evaṃ dvādasadhā ettha, kammāni hi vipajjare.
tika-vin10t:9643_0: Suṇātha nipuṇe pañhe, gūḷhatthe bhaṇato mama.
tika-vin10t:9645_0: Divāpajjati no rattiṃ, rattiṃyeva ca no divā;
tika-vin10t:9646_0: Kathañca paṭiggaṇhanto, na gaṇhanto kathaṃ pana.
tika-vin10t:9652_0: Asamāpattilābhissa, kā ca nāmassa sā bhave.
tika-vin10t:9654_0: Garukaṃ bhaṇato saccaṃ, alikaṃ bhaṇato siyuṃ;
tika-vin10t:9655_0: Lahuṃ saccaṃ bhaṇantassa, musā ca bhaṇato garuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9657_0: Pavisanto ca ārāmaṃ, āpajjati na nikkhamaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9658_0: Nikkhamantova āpatti, na ceva pavisaṃ pana;
tika-vin10t:9665_0: Āpajjati ca dhārento, adhārento tatheva ca;
tika-vin10t:9666_0: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti? Bhaṇāhi me.
tika-vin10t:9669_0: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātāpitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t:9671_0: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9672_0: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhave;
tika-vin10t:9679_0: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, na so pārājiko kathaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9684_0: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:9685_0: Chiddaṃ gehassa nevatthi, kathaṃ methunato cuto;
tika-vin10t:9691_0: Sabbattha nipuṇā dhīrā, ime pañhe bhaṇanti te.
tika-vin10t:9698_0: Chattaṃ paṇṇamayaṃ kiñci, bahi anto ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:9699_0: Pañcavaṇṇena suttena, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9702_0: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā daṇḍe na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9707_0: Ghaṭakaṃ vāḷarūpaṃ vā, lekhā vā pana kevalā;
tika-vin10t:9708_0: Bhinditvā vāpi ghaṃsitvā, dhāretuṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9714_0: Samaṃ satapadādīnaṃ, sibbituṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9716_0: Pattassa pariyante vā, tathā pattamukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t:9717_0: Veṇiṃ saṅkhalikaṃ vāpi, karoto hoti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9723_0: Suttā ca piḷakā tattha, duviññeyyāva dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:9728_0: Sūcikammavikāraṃ vā, aññaṃ vā pana kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9729_0: Cīvare bhikkhunā kātuṃ, kārāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9737_0: Tathā kiliṭṭhakāle ca, dhovanatthaṃ tu vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9739_0: Rajane pana gandhaṃ vā, telaṃ vā lākhameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9740_0: Kiñci pakkhipituṃ tattha, bhikkhuno na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9742_0: Saṅkhena maṇinā vāpi, aññenapi ca kenaci;
tika-vin10t:9743_0: Cīvaraṃ na ca ghaṭṭeyya, ghaṃsitabbaṃ na doṇiyā.
tika-vin10t:9745_0: Cīvaraṃ doṇiyaṃ katvā, nāpi ghaṭṭeyya muṭṭhinā;
tika-vin10t:9746_0: Rattaṃ paharituṃ kiñci, hattheheva ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9748_0: Gaṇṭhike pana lekhā vā, piḷakā vā na vaṭṭati;
tika-vin10t:9751_0: Thālakassa ca pattassa, bahi antopi vā pana;
tika-vin10t:9752_0: Āraggena katā lekhā, na ca vaṭṭati kācipi.
tika-vin10t:9754_0: Āropetvā bhamaṃ pattaṃ, majjitvā ce pacanti ca;
tika-vin10t:9758_0: Na doso koci tatthassa, kātuṃ makaradantakaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9761_0: Kucchiyaṃ vā ṭhapetvā taṃ, lekhaṃ tu mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9763_0: Suttaṃ vā diguṇaṃ katvā, koṭṭenti ca tahiṃ tahiṃ;
tika-vin10t:9769_0: Akkhīni tattha dassetvā, koṭṭite pana kā kathā;
tika-vin10t:9770_0: Kakkaṭakkhīni vā tattha, uṭṭhāpetuṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9772_0: Ghaṭaṃ deḍḍubhasīsaṃ vā, makarassa mukhampi vā;
tika-vin10t:9773_0: Vikārarūpaṃ yaṃ kiñci, na vaṭṭati dasāmukhe.
tika-vin10t:9775_0: Ujukaṃ macchakaṇṭaṃ vā, maṭṭhaṃ vā pana paṭṭikaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9782_0: Rajjuyo na ca vaṭṭanti, purimā dvedasā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9785_0: Ekā dviticatasso vā, vaṭṭanti na tato paraṃ.
tika-vin10t:9788_0: Tañca pāmaṅgasaṇṭhānaṃ, ekampi ca na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9790_0: Rajjuke ekato katvā, bahū ekāya rajjuyā;
tika-vin10t:9800_0: Na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhūnaṃ, añjanī janarañjanī.
tika-vin10t:9802_0: Tādisaṃ pana ghaṃsitvā, veṭhetvā suttakena vā;
tika-vin10t:9803_0: Vaḷañjantassa bhikkhussa, na doso koci vijjati.
tika-vin10t:9805_0: Vaṭṭā vā caturassā vā, aṭṭhaṃsā vāpi añjanī;
tika-vin10t:9812_0: Yaṃ kiñci pana sibbetvā, vaḷañjantassa vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9815_0: Ṭhapetuṃ pana yaṃ kiñci, na ca vaṭṭati bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:9818_0: Valitvā ca nakhacchedaṃ, karontīti hi vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9821_0: Mālākammādi yaṃ kiñci, vaṇṇamaṭṭhaṃ na vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9824_0: Dvīsu passesu lohena, bandhituṃ pana vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9827_0: Vaṭṭalekhāva vaṭṭanti, ekā vā dvepi heṭṭhato.
tika-vin10t:9835_0: Tathā pattapidhāne ca, tālavaṇṭe ca bījane;
tika-vin10t:9849_0: Buddhaṃ dhammañca saṅghañca, na uddissa davaṃ kare;
tika-vin10t:9852_0: Kāyaṃ vā aṅgajātaṃ vā, ūruṃ vā na tu dassaye;
tika-vin10t:9853_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu tā vāpi, na siñce udakādinā.
tika-vin10t:9856_0: Dukkaṭaṃ puna dātabbaṃ, gīvā naṭṭhepi jajjare.
tika-vin10t:9858_0: Codito so sace tehi, bhikkhūhi na dadeyyataṃ;
tika-vin10t:9862_0: Davā silaṃ pavijjhanto, dukkaṭā na ca muccati.
tika-vin10t:9870_0: Na ca bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, sampayojeyya kiñcipi;
tika-vin10t:9873_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ have bhikkhu, pātimokkhaṃ na uddise;
tika-vin10t:9874_0: Āpattiṃ vā sace tāsaṃ, paṭiggaṇheyya dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9880_0: Aggaṃ gahetvā dātuṃ vā, pattādīsupyayaṃ nayo.
tika-vin10t:9889_0: Pakkhipitvāna pākatthaṃ, cāletuṃ na ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9892_0: Tattha cādīnavaṃ tassa, vattuṃ pana ca vaṭṭati.
tika-vin10t:9895_0: Kataṃ nissāya dussīlaṃ, tayā viharatā”ti ca.
tika-vin10t:9897_0: Bhattagge yāgupāne ca, antogāme ca vīthiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9900_0: Sutto khādañca bhuñjanto, vaccaṃ muttampi vā karaṃ;
tika-vin10t:9906_0: Ekādasa abhabbā ca, garukaṭṭhā ca pañcime;
tika-vin10t:9907_0: Vandato dukkaṭaṃ vuttaṃ, bāvīsati ca puggale.
tika-vin10t:9910_0: Dhammavādī ca sambuddho, vandanīyā tayo ime.
tika-vin10t:9915_0: Adhiṭṭhānaṃ panekassa, dvinnaṃ vā tiṇṇameva vā;
tika-vin10t:9924_0: Tattha appaṭikammā ca, yā ca vuṭṭhānagāminī;
tika-vin10t:9943_0: Tatraṭṭho pana so dvinnaṃ, kammaṃ kopeti saṅghikaṃ.
tika-vin10t:9958_0: Vuttā samaṇakappā ca, pañca, pañca visuddhiyo.
tika-vin10t:9960_0: Nidānaṃ puggalaṃ vatthuṃ, vidhiṃ paññattiyā pana;
tika-vin10t:9969_0: Nidānaṃ tattha vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t:9973_0: Satāni hi cha ūnāni, tīṇi sāvatthiyā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:9975_0: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;

tika-vin10t:12325_0: Aṭṭha saṅghādisesesu, ubhinnaṃ tu vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:12338_0: Niruttaro bhavati hi so, na saṃsayo.
tika-vin10t:12342_0: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, bhikkhūnaṃ suṇataṃ puna;
tika-vin10t:12346_0: Paṭicca methunaṃ dhammaṃ, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12349_0: Mukhena methunaṃ dhammaṃ, katvā pārājiko bhave.
tika-vin10t:12351_0: Suññe nissattake dīpe, eko bhikkhu sace vase;
tika-vin10t:12354_0: Lambī vā mudupiṭṭhī vā, vaccamagge mukhepi vā;
tika-vin10t:12357_0: Sayaṃ nādiyate kiñci, parañca na samādape;
tika-vin10t:12364_0: Parassa tu parikkhāraṃ, na ca pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12367_0: Gaṇhanto theyyacittena, na ca pārājiko siyā.
tika-vin10t:12369_0: Attano santakaṃ datvā, bhikkhu pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12372_0: Pitari pitusaññī ca, mātusaññī ca mātari;
tika-vin10t:12373_0: Hantvānantariyaṃ kammaṃ, na phuseyya kathaṃ naro?
tika-vin10t:12379_0: Gacchaṃ ṭhito nisinno vā, kathaṃ pārājiko bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:12385_0: Kathaṃ? Kathehi me puṭṭho, vinaye ce visārado.
tika-vin10t:12391_0: Acaritvā yathāvuttaṃ, vattaṃ so vuṭṭhito kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12401_0: Vaṇṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne yo, titthiyānaṃ tu kujjhati;
tika-vin10t:12404_0: Atthaṅgate tu sūriye, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:12407_0: Yo ca romanthayitvāna, rattiṃ ghasati bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12410_0: Atthaṅgate ca sūriye, gahetvā bhikkhu bhojanaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12411_0: Sace bhuñjeyya āpatti, anāpatti kathaṃ bhave?
tika-vin10t:12414_0: Āgantvā idha kālena, natthi āpatti bhuñjato.
tika-vin10t:12416_0: Gāme vā yadi vāraññe, yaṃ paresaṃ mamāyitaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12417_0: Na harantova taṃ theyyā, kathaṃ pārājiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12422_0: Nārī rūpavatī bālā, bhikkhu rattena cetasā;
tika-vin10t:12423_0: Methunaṃ tāya katvāpi, so na pārājiko kathaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12428_0: Ekissā dve siyuṃ puttā, jātā idha panitthiyā;
tika-vin10t:12429_0: Dvinnaṃ mātā pitā sāva, kathaṃ hoti bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t:12432_0: Gaṇhāpeti paraṃ gabbhaṃ, tasmā mātā pitā ca sā.
tika-vin10t:12438_0: Dārakassa ca mātā hi, kātuṃ labhati bhikkhunī.
tika-vin10t:12440_0: Ko ca bhikkhūhi sikkhāsu, asādhāraṇataṃ gato;
tika-vin10t:12441_0: Na pārivāsiko brūhi, na ukkhittādikopi ca?
tika-vin10t:12444_0: Na so labhati aññesaṃ, kappatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t:12447_0: Katamo puggalo brūhi, na mato na ca jīvati?
tika-vin10t:12450_0: Hoti nimmitabuddho so, na mato na ca jīvati.
tika-vin10t:12455_0: Naro karoti ce kuṭiṃ, sa sabbamattikāmayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12456_0: Na muccateva vajjato, jinena vuttato tato.
tika-vin10t:12469_0: Parassā pana yā vajjaṃ, paṭicchādeti bhikkhunī;
tika-vin10t:12477_0: Abhabbā pana ye vuttā, puggalā paṇḍakādayo;
tika-vin10t:12480_0: Anuggiraṃ giraṃ kiñci, subhaṃ vā yadi vāsubhaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12481_0: Phuse vācasikaṃ vajjaṃ, kathaṃ me pucchito bhaṇa?
tika-vin10t:12495_0: Saṃvidhāya ca cattāro, garuṃ theniṃsu bhaṇḍakaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12496_0: Thero thullaccayaṃ tesu, patto, sesā parājayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:12498_0: Kathaṃ? Chamāsakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ, tattha sāhatthikā tayo;
tika-vin10t:12499_0: Haṭā therena māsā tu, tayo āṇattiyāpi ca.
tika-vin10t:12506_0: Bahiddhā gehato bhikkhu, itthī gabbhantaraṃ gatā;
tika-vin10t:12507_0: Chiddaṃ gehassa no atthi, methunapaccayā cuto.
tika-vin10t:12512_0: Sappiādiṃ tu bhesajjaṃ, gahetvā sāmameva taṃ;
tika-vin10t:12519_0: Ekatova kathaṃ bhikkhu, āpajjeyya bhaṇāhi me?
tika-vin10t:12521_0: Saṅghe pariṇataṃ lābhaṃ, attano ca parassa ca;
tika-vin10t:12535_0: Nissaggiyāni sabbāni, kathaṃ honti kathehi me?
tika-vin10t:12537_0: Kaṇṇaṃ gahetvā tattheva, kaddamaṃ yadi dhovati;
tika-vin10t:12540_0: Purisaṃ apitaraṃ hantvā, itthiṃ hantvā amātaraṃ;
tika-vin10t:12543_0: Parivatte tu liṅgasmiṃ, pitaraṃ itthitaṃ gataṃ;
tika-vin10t:12544_0: Mātaraṃ purisattaṃ tu, gataṃ hantvā garuṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:12546_0: Mātaraṃ pana māretvā, māretvā pitarampi ca;
tika-vin10t:12552_0: Codetvā sammukhībhūtaṃ, saṅgho kammaṃ kareyya ce;
tika-vin10t:12553_0: Kathaṃ kammaṃ akammaṃ taṃ, saṅgho sāpattiko siyā?
tika-vin10t:12567_0: Bhesajjāni hi pañceva, gahetvā bhājane visuṃ;
tika-vin10t:12582_0: Anāpatti hi so rukkho, hoti ekakulassa ce.
tika-vin10t:12589_0: Nānitthīnaṃ tu kese vā, tāsaṃ aṅguliyopi vā;
tika-vin10t:12590_0: Ekato gahaṇe tassa, honti sambahulā pana.
tika-vin10t:12601_0: Methunaṃ na ca sevanto, methunappaccayā cuto?
tika-vin10t:12606_0: Mātaraṃ cīvaraṃ yāce, saṅghe pariṇataṃ na ca;
tika-vin10t:12607_0: Kenassa hoti āpatti, anāpatti ca ñātake?
tika-vin10t:12623_0: Ekassa kammaṃ tu na rūhate kiṃ?
tika-vin10t:12630_0: Saṅghenapi hi ākāse, ṭhitena pana iddhiyā;
tika-vin10t:12631_0: Bhūmigassa na kātabbaṃ, karoti yadi kuppati.
tika-vin10t:12633_0: Na ca kappakataṃ vatthaṃ, na ca rattaṃ akappiyaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12637_0: Na cassākappiyaṃ nāma, cīvaraṃ pana vijjati.
tika-vin10t:12639_0: Na kutopi ca gaṇhati kiñci have;
tika-vin10t:12640_0: Na tu deti ca kiñcipi bhojanato;
tika-vin10t:12658_0: Chādeti, na phuse vajjaṃ, kathaṃ jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t:12664_0: Dvijaṃ kantamakantañca, sace jānāsi me vada?
tika-vin10t:12684_0: Nidānaṃ nāma vesālī, tathā rājagahaṃ puraṃ;
tika-vin10t:12687_0: Kati vesāliyā vuttā, kati rājagahe katā?
tika-vin10t:12691_0: Kati bhaggesu paññattā, taṃ me akkhāhi pucchito?
tika-vin10t:12696_0: Cha panāḷaviyaṃ vuttā, aṭṭha kosambiyaṃ katā;
tika-vin10t:12697_0: Aṭṭha sakkesu paññattā, tayo bhaggesu dīpitā.
tika-vin10t:12703_0: Bhikkhunīsu ca akkoso, dasa vesāliyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t:12714_0: Vosāsantī ca naccaṃ vā, gītaṃ vā cārikadvayaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12727_0: Ovādopi ca bhesajjaṃ, sūci āraññakesu ca.
tika-vin10t:12739_0: Daseva pana gārayhā, dvesattati ca sekhiyā.
tika-vin10t:12742_0: Ime vuttāvasesā hi, sabbe sāvatthiyaṃ katā.
tika-vin10t:12747_0: Dve gārayhā, tayo sekhā, chappaññāseva sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:12748_0: Bhavanti chasu paññattā, nagaresu ca piṇḍitā.
tika-vin10t:12753_0: Sikkhāpadāni bhikkhūnaṃ, vīsañca dve satāni ca;
tika-vin10t:12754_0: Bhikkhunīnaṃ tu cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12757_0: Aniyatā duve vuttā, tiṃsa nissaggiyāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12759_0: Khuddakā navuti dve ca, cattāro pāṭidesanā;
tika-vin10t:12762_0: Dve satāni ca vīsañca, vasā bhikkhūnameva ca;
tika-vin10t:12765_0: Pārājikāni aṭṭheva, garukā dasa satta ca;
tika-vin10t:12766_0: Nissaggiyāni tiṃseva, chasaṭṭhi ca satampi ca.
tika-vin10t:12769_0: Sabbāni pana cattāri, tathā tīṇi satāni ca.
tika-vin10t:12771_0: Bhavanti pana etāni, bhikkhunīnaṃ vasā pana;
tika-vin10t:12777_0: Cha ca saṅghādisesā ca, tathā aniyatā duve;
tika-vin10t:12778_0: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, dvāvīsati ca khuddakā.
tika-vin10t:12784_0: Kuṭi ceva vihāro ca, chaḷete garukā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12789_0: Tatiyepi ca vaggasmiṃ, patto ca paṭhamo tathā;
tika-vin10t:12810_0: Bhikkhūhi bhikkhunīnañca, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12814_0: Dvādaseva ca nissaggā, khuddakā navuticcha ca.
tika-vin10t:12816_0: Aṭṭheva pana gārayhā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavantime;
tika-vin10t:12832_0: Ekatoyeva paññattā, sataṃ tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:12835_0: Pārājikāni cattāri, garukā ca dasaccha ca.
tika-vin10t:12840_0: Dvādaseva ca gārayhā, sataṃ sattati caccha ca;
tika-vin10t:12854_0: Ito paraṃ pavakkhāmi, lakkhaṇaṃ pana sabbagaṃ;
tika-vin10t:12855_0: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, vadato me nibodhatha.
tika-vin10t:12866_0: Puggalo nāma yaṃ yaṃ tu, bhikkhumārabbha bhikkhuniṃ;
tika-vin10t:12867_0: Sikkhāpadaṃ tu paññattaṃ, ayaṃ vuccati puggalo.
tika-vin10t:12873_0: Thullanandādayo satta, sabbe tiṃsa bhavanti hi.
tika-vin10t:12875_0: Vatthūti puggalasseva, tassa tassa ca sabbaso;
tika-vin10t:12878_0: Kevalā pana paññatti, mūlabhūtā tatheva sā;
tika-vin10t:12903_0: Āṇattīti ca nāmesā, ñeyyā āṇāpanā pana.
tika-vin10t:12908_0: Kāyenapi ca vācāya, yā karontassa jāyate;
tika-vin10t:12917_0: Siyā pana karontassa, akarontassa yā siyā;
tika-vin10t:12934_0: Puna sabbāva cittassa, vasena duvidhā siyuṃ.
tika-vin10t:12945_0: Yassā sacittake pakkhe, cittaṃ akusalaṃ siyā;
tika-vin10t:12985_0: Dve panāpattimūlāni, kāyo vācā bhavanti hi;
tika-vin10t:12988_0: Kati gāmantare vuttā, nadīpāre tathā kati?
tika-vin10t:12989_0: Kati thullaccayaṃ maṃse, kati maṃsesu dukkaṭaṃ?
tika-vin10t:12994_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāti ca dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13000_0: Tathā bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13001_0: Abhirūhati nāvaṃ ce, hoti pācitti bhikkhuno.
tika-vin10t:13004_0: Paṭhame, dutiye tassā, hoti bhikkhuniyā garuṃ.
tika-vin10t:13006_0: Kati vācasikā rattiṃ, kati vācasikā divā?
tika-vin10t:13007_0: Duve vācasikā rattiṃ, duve vācasikā divā.
tika-vin10t:13019_0: Kati vā dadamānassa, kati vā paṭigaṇhato?
tika-vin10t:13022_0: Manussassa visaṃ deti, sace marati tena so;
tika-vin10t:13023_0: Hoti pārājikaṃ, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mataṃ.
tika-vin10t:13026_0: Tathā pācitti aññāti-kāya ce deti cīvaraṃ.
tika-vin10t:13040_0: Kati dhaññarasā vuttā, vikāle kappiyā pana?
tika-vin10t:13044_0: Ratticchedo katīnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā kati?
tika-vin10t:13047_0: Ratticchedo duvinnaṃ tu, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t:13050_0: Pārājikāni kāyamhā, ime dve pana jāyare.
tika-vin10t:13061_0: Dvaṅgulaṃ vā dumāsaṃ vā, paññattā dvaṅgulā duve.
tika-vin10t:13064_0: Kati obhāsane vuttā, sañcaritte tathā kati?
tika-vin10t:13072_0: Pārājikaṃ siyā, yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ mate.
tika-vin10t:13084_0: Dukkaṭaṃ pana niddiṭṭhaṃ, tisso obhāsanā yimā.
tika-vin10t:13087_0: Dvīhi thullaccayaṃ vuttaṃ, ekena pana dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13093_0: Bhūtagāmaṃ tu pācitti, aṅgajātaṃ tu thullatā.
tika-vin10t:13095_0: Visaṃ chaḍḍetyanodissa, manusso marati tena ce;
tika-vin10t:13096_0: Pārājikaṃ, mate yakkhe, pete thullaccayaṃ siyā.
tika-vin10t:13101_0: Gacchato katidhāpatti, ṭhitassa kati me vada?
tika-vin10t:13107_0: Bhikkhu bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ, saṃvidhāne tu dukkaṭaṃ;
tika-vin10t:13114_0: Posassa hatthapāse tu, pācitti yadi tiṭṭhati.
tika-vin10t:13120_0: Hitvā tiṭṭhati ce tassā, hoti saṅghādisesatā.
tika-vin10t:13131_0: Anissagge tu pācitti, pāpikāya ca diṭṭhiyā;
tika-vin10t:13141_0: Gahetvā bhojanaṃ kiñci, sabbaṃ maṃsaṃ akappiyaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13153_0: Olokentassa vā vuttaṃ, mukhaṃ bhikkhaṃ dadantiyā.
tika-vin10t:13164_0: Mettiyā dūsako ceva, kaṇṭakoti tayo ime;
tika-vin10t:13168_0: Dve tayo anusāvetuṃ, vaṭṭatīti ca niddise.
tika-vin10t:13170_0: Ñattiyā kappanā ceva, tathā vippakatampi ca;
tika-vin10t:13180_0: Kāraṇehi pana dvīhi, saṅgho bhijjati, naññathā.
tika-vin10t:13192_0: Yo te vasati ārāme, vadaṃ thullaccayaṃ phuse.
tika-vin10t:13194_0: Viññāpetvā paṇītaṃ tu, bhojanaṃ bhikkhu bhuñjati;
tika-vin10t:13197_0: Viññāpetvāna sūpaṃ vā, odanaṃ vā anāmayo;
tika-vin10t:13198_0: Bhikkhu bhuñjati ce tassa, hoti āpatti dukkaṭaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13213_0: Bhavanti pana sabbāni, aḍḍhuḍḍhāni satāni hi.
tika-vin10t:13223_0: Atthe akkharabandhe vā, viññāsassa kamepi vā;
tika-vin10t:13224_0: Kaṅkhā tasmā na kātabbā, kātabbā bahumānatā.
tika-vin10t:13235_0: Vāceti ca paraṃ niccaṃ, atthaṃ upaparikkhati.
tika-vin10t:13237_0: Yo tassa pana bhikkhussa, atthā vinayanissitā;
tika-vin10t:13263_0: Rājā pātu mahiṃ sammā, kāle devo pavassatu.
tika-vin10t:13265_0: Yāva tiṭṭhati selindo, yāva cando virocati;
tika-vin10t:13277_0: Akāsiṃ paramaṃ etaṃ, uttaraṃ nāma nāmato;
tika-vin10t:13278_0: Savane sādaraṃ katvā, sikkhitabbo tato ayaṃ.
tika-vin10t:13285_1: kavivaravasabhena paramaratikaravaramadhuravacanuggārena uragapurena buddhadattena racito uttaravinicchayo
